 Ads Specialist to join our growing marketing team. This role plays a critical part in generating high-quality leads, scaling campaigns, optimizing ad performance, and ensuring strong ROI across Meta platforms.



The ideal candidate has deep experience in paid social advertising, strong understanding of audience targeting, and proven ability to manage full-funnel
 ad campaigns. You must be able to analyze insights, adjust strategies quickly, and communicate performance clearly to management and clients.



This position requires someone data-driven, strategic, and capable of executing high-performing ad campaigns with accuracy, creativity, and best-practice methodology.



Key Responsibilities

Campaign Strategy & Planning



Develop effective
 and Instagram advertising strategies based on client goals

Create campaign structures including TOF/MOF/BOF funnels

Perform competitor analysis and market research to identify opportunities

Define audience segments, interest targeting, and lookalike audiences

Plan budgets, bidding strategies, and campaign pacing



Campaign Execution & Optimization



Set up, launch, and manage paid campaigns inside Meta Ads Manager

Write compelling ad copy and collaborate on creatives (images, videos, UGC)

Test variations through A/B testing (copy, creatives, targeting, placements)

Monitor daily campaign performance and adjust strategies for highest ROI

Optimize ads for lower CPA, higher ROAS, and better quality leads

Troubleshoot performance drops, delivery issues, and disapproved ads



Tracking, Analytics & Reporting



Implement and verify Meta Pixel, API Conversion, and event tracking

Analyze data to identify trends, bottlenecks, and optimization opportunities

Prepare weekly, monthly, and quarterly performance reports

Track KPIs such as CTR, CPC, CPM, ROAS, CPA, Quality Score, and conversions

Provide actionable recommendations based on insights and performance results



Client Communication & Coordination



Communicate campaign progress, results, and strategic recommendations

Gather client inputs, understand objectives, and propose solutions

Work alongside creative, content, and sales teams to align messaging

Provide guidance on landing page improvements for conversion growth



Compliance, Testing & Quality Control



Ensure all ads comply with Meta’s advertising policies

Maintain organized documentation of ad sets, targeting, and experiments

Conduct regular audits of campaigns, audiences, and tracking setups

Maintain accuracy of all dashboards, naming conventions, and campaign files

Continuously research industry changes, algorithm updates, and best practices



Required Skills & Experience

Essential Qualifications



Proven experience as a
 Ads Specialist or Paid Social Media Manager

Strong understanding of Ads Manager, Pixel, Conversion API, and Events Manager

Demonstrated ability to run ROI-focused lead generation or e-commerce campaigns

Experience with budgeting, forecasting, and scaling ad campaigns

Strong English communication skills, verbal and written

Experience analyzing metrics and implementing data-driven decisions



Technical & Analytical Skills



Proficient in Meta Ads Manager, Business Manager, and Meta Events Manager

Strong analytical skills with expertise in reading dashboards and ad metrics

Experience with tools like Google Analytics, tracking tools, and reporting systems

Ability to perform A/B tests and interpret results

Strong attention to detail and accuracy in campaign execution



Professional Attributes



Highly responsive and accountable during working hours

Strong sense of ownership and ability to work with minimal supervision

Creative mindset with the ability to propose new ideas

Calm under pressure and able to troubleshoot performance issues quickly

Results-oriented, focused on KPIs and continuous improvement



Workstation Requirements (Must-Have)



Fast and reliable computer

Stable high-speed internet connection

Dedicated, quiet workspace for meetings and collaboration

Ability to respond quickly and be available during required hours

About PropFix.ie



PropFix.ie is Ireland's trusted property maintenance specialist, offering comprehensive solutions with years of expertise across the construction and renovation sectors. We transform spaces through our diverse range of services, from handyman solutions and office fit-outs to complete renovations, house extensions, and specialized installations including doors, floors, and partitions.



Our commitment to delivering the best value property maintenance has established us as a reliable partner for residential and commercial clients nationwide. With decades of experience, including 50 years of expertise in garage conversions, we pride ourselves on impeccable craftsmanship, turning our clients' visions into reality while ensuring their properties remain in top condition.

 Management: Handle professional
 correspondence and client communications

mbers

Software Proficiency: Competency in Microsoft Office Suite, project management software, and administrative tools

title: Affiliate Manager (Affiliate Recruitment + Management)
description:
As an **Affiliate Manager**, you are responsible for building and managing a high-quality network of Affiliates and Creators (Promoters).



This is **not** a sales role and **not** a learning role.



It is a trust, quality, and operations role for candidates who already know how to:

* Recruit affiliates

* Evaluate performance

* Enforce rules

* Deliver results independently



You will operate within clear systems and authority.



---



## **What You’ll Do**

* Recruit and source qualified Promoter candidates

* Review and approve Promoter applications

* Onboard Promoters and ensure rule compliance

* Monitor Promoter performance and behavior

* Investigate disputes using system logs and evidence

* Enforce platform policies (including suspensions and bans)

* Maintain clean internal records and reporting

* Deliver measurable promoter growth and quality



---



## **Who We’re Looking For**



This role is ideal if you are:

* Experienced in recruiting and managing affiliates

* Comfortable enforcing rules and making judgment calls

* Detail-oriented and process-driven

* Calm, professional, and fair in disputes

* Strong in written and verbal English

* Able to work independently with minimal oversight



**MUST Have (Non-Negotiable):**

* Hands-on experience recruiting affiliates or promoters

* Experience managing affiliate or creator programs

* Background in community moderation, compliance, trust & safety, or ops

* Proven ability to deliver results without training



Applicants without direct affiliate recruitment and management experience will not be considered.



---



## **Requirements**

* Reliable internet connection

* Quiet, professional home workspace

* Ability to manage time independently

* Willingness to follow strict operating guidelines

* Flexible availability (results matter more than fixed hours)



---



## **Compensation**

* BASE PAY: **USD $2,500 – $3,500 per month** (based on experience and performance)

* BONUSES: Performance-based bonuses tied to promoter recruitment quality and outcomes

* Paid monthly



---



## **How to Apply (Required)**

To be considered, **all candidates must submit a short video** **(3–5 minutes) explaining:**

* Your past experience recruiting affiliates or promoters

* Exactly how you would recruit affiliates for Promofy starting on Day 1

* The channels, tactics, or systems you would use

* How many affiliates you realistically expect to recruit in your first 30 days



Applications **without an accessible video submission link (Loom/YouTube/Dropbox) will not be reviewed**.



Qualified candidates will be invited to the next stage of the review process.

title: Telemarketer
description:
Job Title: High-Energy Cold Caller (US Construction Sales)

Location: 100% Remote (Work from home)



Shift: EST Business Hours (Night Shift in PH)



Compensation: $150 USD per week



Are you a closer with a "never-say-die" attitude?



We are looking for a relentless, high-energy Cold Caller to join our growing team. If you have a neutral accent, a thick skin, and the ability to turn a "No" into a "Maybe" and a "Maybe" into a "Yes," we want you. This is a heavy phone sales role—you’ll be making 100+ calls a day—but for the right person, the rewards are massive.



What’s in it for you?



Competitive Pay



Uncapped Bonuses: Earn extra $$$ for every qualified lead or deal closed.



Stability: Long-term, full-time position with a supportive US-based team.



Growth: We promote from within. Show us your results, and your role will expand.



No Commute: Save your money and time by working from the comfort of your home.



What you’ll be doing:



Heavy Outbound Dialing: Dialing prospects in the US throughout your shift.



Lead Generation: Identifying motivated sellers/clients and qualifying their interest.



Data Management: Accurately updating our CRM with notes and follow-up reminders.



Script Mastery: Using our proven scripts while staying natural and conversational.



Requirements:



Sales Experience: At least 1 year of experience in cold calling or BPO outbound sales.



English Fluency: Excellent verbal and written English with a neutral accent.



Tech Savvy: Familiarity with dialers (Mojo, XenCall) and CRMs is a huge plus.



Reliability: A quiet home office, a noise-canceling headset, and a stable backup internet connection (essential).



The "Grind" Mentality: You don't get discouraged by rejection; you thrive on the hunt.



How to Apply:



Send a link to your resume.



Crucial: Attach a 60-second voice recording (Vocaroo link preferred) introducing yourself and telling us about your biggest sales win.



Applications without a voice sample will not be considered.

title: Senior Front-End Developer (Custom WordPress)
description:
We’re hiring a top-tier Front-End Developer to join our team at Coggno – a fast-growing, scaling startup. If you’re a detail-obsessed builder who takes pride in thoughtful, polished execution, this might be the role for you.



What We’re Looking For:



This is not your average WordPress job.



Our site is hosted on WordPress. We’re looking for a high-level front-end developer with real expertise and experience working in a professional development workflow.

If you thrive writing clean, scalable, front-end code from scratch or from a Figma design, we want to talk. We need extreme skill with unbelievable attention to detail. We need to move quickly and accurately to build an amazing product as this won’t just be “fixing bugs” -- you will be instrumental in building a product designed to scale. We need someone comfortable writing front-end code from scratch and thinking critically about how to solve UI problems without waiting for pixel-perfect guidance.



About the Role:

You’ll be working on:

• Implementing pixel-perfect UI designs directly from Figma

• Writing custom front-end code in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and PHP

• Resolving design bugs and polishing layouts quickly and accurately

• Attending live video calls and collaborating directly with our team

• Prioritizing performance, mobile responsiveness, and clean code structure



You’ll be responsible for:

• Collaborating directly with the product and UX teams

 • Asking smart questions early to reduce feedback loops

 • Owning the outcome of your work and improving the overall UX when possible



This role is more than just checking off tasks. You’ll be expected to make the product better as you build. Noticing edge cases, proposing fixes, and tightening up designs when something feels off.



You’re a Fit If You Have:

• 5–10+ years of front-end development experience (with PHP-heavy projects).

• Strong command of HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, and PHP.

• Expertise in converting Figma files into responsive web pages.

• Sharp attention to detail — pixel perfection matters.

• Excellent English communication skills (both written and verbal).

• Ability and willingness to join live video meetings when needed.

• Comfortable working independently and meeting deadlines.

 • Aim to minimize feedback by delivering high-quality work the first time

 • Can clearly explain your reasoning, ask early questions, and move forward independently

 • Think in components — not just pages — and care about consistency across the UI

 • High standards for UI polish, design consistency, and performance



Compensation

$1500 Month

title: Remote Customer Service & Move Consultant
description:
We are looking for a Remote Customer Service Representative (CSR) / Move Consultant who understands that sales is about service first. Someone who can build rapport quickly, listen intentionally, guide customers with care, and confidently convert inquiries into booked moves.



If you love talking to people, building relationships, and closing with integrity — this is for you.



If you only want to “answer phones” — this is not the role.



Role Overview



This is a remote, inbound sales-focused CSR position handling:

Warm inbound calls

Web quote requests

Referrals

Follow-ups



Your role is to:

Respond quickly

Ask the right questions

Educate customers clearly

Build trust

Follow up consistently

Close and book moves

Success in this role means:

Fast response times

Strong follow-up discipline

Clean and detailed CRM notes

Consistent bookings

Customers feeling heard, valued, and confident in choosing us



You will work daily inside SmartMoving CRM and use Dialpad for calls and texting.



Key Responsibilities



1. Build Genuine Connection

Answer inbound calls with warmth, professionalism, and empathy

Listen actively and understand the customer’s situation

Make customers feel supported — not rushed



2. Qualify & Guide the Move

Ask structured questions (move date, locations, stairs, elevators, long carry, specialty items, packing needs, etc.)

Identify concerns or stress points

Position our services as solutions — not just pricing



3. Quote, Close & Book

Provide accurate quotes or schedule estimates

Clearly explain services, policies, and booking process

Confidently secure booking (date/time + deposit when appropriate)

Overcome objections with care and professionalism



4. Follow-Up With Purpose

Run consistent follow-ups via call, text, and

Manage pipeline until every lead is marked Booked or Lost

No lead left behind



5. CRM & Team Coordination

Maintain accurate notes and lead statuses in SmartMoving

Create clear next-step tasks

Coordinate with Move Coordinators to ensure smooth handoff

Support schedule adjustments during high-volume periods



What We’re Really Looking For



We are NOT looking for a script reader.



We are looking for someone who:

? Naturally builds rapport

? Listens more than they talk

? Understands sales is service

? Is comfortable closing

? Follows up without being reminded

? Takes ownership of results

? Cares about the customer experience



Requirements

>2+ year experience in inside sales, call center sales, appointment setting, or phone-heavy customer roles

Comfortable being on the phone most of the day

Strong follow-up discipline and time management

Detail-oriented with accurate CRM data entry

Clear, professional verbal and written communication

Coachable and open to feedback

Reliable internet, quiet remote workspace, and professional phone presence



Preferred Experience

Moving, logistics, home services, restoration, HVAC, roofing, or service-based sales

Experience using SmartMoving or similar CRM

Objection handling and phone closing experience



Performance Expectations



This role includes performance incentives tied to:

Booked moves

Response time

Follow-up completion rate

CRM accuracy

Overall customer experience



We value numbers — but we value how you achieve them even more.



Who Will Thrive Here

Someone who believes:

People can feel your energy through the phone

Sales is about helping people make confident decisions

Follow-up shows you care

Connection converts better than pressure



If you want to just “clock in and answer calls,” this WON'T be a fit.



If you want to make meaningful conversations while hitting goals — we’d love to meet you.

Managing client onboarding 
s, form submissions, setting up folders)

Posting, editing, and refreshing
 & IG ads

title: Creative Strategist
description:
We’re looking for a sharp, trend-obsessed female Creative Strategist to help scale our make-up brand by turning what works in the market into winning ad creatives. 



You live and breathe competitor research, viral ads, UGC trends, and platform patterns, and you know how to translate insights into high-converting video ideas.



What you’ll do

-Constantly analyze top-performing ads from competitors and the wider beauty market

-Stay ahead of trends on Meta, TikTok, and UGC platforms

-Turn insights into clear video concepts, hooks, angles, and scripts

-Source, brief, and manage creators to execute those ideas

-Work closely with the creative team to deliver finished, ready-to-launch ads



You’re a great fit if you

-Have a strong female consumer intuition (beauty / skincare is a big plus)

-Know what actually performs in paid ads — not just what looks nice

-Can move fast, test often, and iterate based on results

-Are highly organized and execution-focused, not just “idea-driven” 



If interested, please reply with with your resume and portfolio. Use Subject "SM - Creative Strategist".

title: AI Video Specialist
description:
Please read the job description and application instructions carefully. 



AI Creative Video Specialist (Product Motion & AI-Generated Content)



About the Project

Our client is launching an experimental creative initiative to breathe new life into their existing product line using cutting-edge AI video tools. Their products are functional but visually outdated and they would want to transform them into dynamic, modern, high-impact visual experiences using AI-generated motion, cinematic effects, and engaging short-form video. This is a creative-forward role focused on innovation and experimentation.



This will be an ongoing opportunity for the right person.



Project Scope:

- Produce 2 dynamic product videos per month

- Each video: 15–30 seconds

- AI-assisted production (majority AI-generated)

- Final output includes: motion graphics, text overlays, optional AI voiceover, clean editing and pacing



Responsibilities:

- Transform static product images/renders into dynamic video using AI tools such as: Kling AI, Higgsfield AI

- Generate motion concepts (rotations, exploded views, transitions, cinematic reveals) - Sample video reference: 
 

- Create or enhance product assets using AI image tools (if needed)

- Edit and refine videos using: Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro OR equivalent tools such as CapCut

- Add professional motion graphics and typography

- Iterate and improve AI outputs (fix distortions, refine transitions, enhance realism)

- Deliver export-ready final videos optimized for social and digital platforms



Qualifications:

- Experienced with AI video generation tools and workflows, including scene transitions and cinematic control

- Strong in motion design, visual storytelling, and clean typography

- Skilled at creating polished, product-focused video content

- Comfortable experimenting, iterating, and pushing creative boundaries

- Collaborative and communicative, able to take direction and work closely with the Creative Director and other tea
mbers



About UpCierge

UpCierge is a boutique firm providing high-quality virtual assistant services to a select clientele. We value our tea
mbers and foster a supportive, flexible, and rewarding work environment.



To apply, please fill out this form:

title: Meta Media Buyer
description:
We are a performance-driven marketing company focused on scaling paid advertising campaigns that generate high-intent leads and measurable ROI. We specialize in structured testing, disciplined optimization, and data-backed decision-making across digital platforms.



We are looking for an experienced Media Buyer with deep expertise in Meta advertising to manage and scale paid campaigns while maintaining strong tracking integrity and performance standards.



RESPONSIBILITIES

Salary increase

 your resume to

title: Content Scraper
description:
We are looking for a resourceful and detail-oriented Content Researcher & Media Editor to join our team on a freelance basis, with the opportunity to grow into a long-term Virtual Assistant role.



What you'll do:

You will search for and collect specific content from the internet based on competitor research or assigned briefs. The content you source will often contain subtitles, watermarks, or other overlays. It is mandatory that you are able to cleanly remove these while maintaining the original quality of the media. You will deliver polished, ready-to-use files.

What we're looking for:



Proven ability to remove watermarks and subtitles from video and image content without losing quality

Strong internet research skills — you know how to find things quickly and efficiently

A proactive, self-starter mindset: if you hit a wall, you search for solutions rather than waiting around

Reliability and clear communication — we value people who keep us in the loop and deliver on time

Comfortable working independently in a remote setup



Why work with us:

This starts as a gig, but we're looking for someone to stick around. If things go well, we'll expand your role into a broader VA position with a variety of tasks and a long-term collaboration.

How to apply:

Send an
 to 
 with a brief introduction, your relevant experience, and examples of your work (especially watermark or subtitle removal). We look forward to hearing from you!

title: YouTube video editor & YouTube SEO
description:
I need a reliable video editor for youtube videos. I do a lot of screen recordings, and you need to clean them up and prepare them for youtube. There's both some videos which will be private and some that will be public.



I have an existing process that I can show you, you do not need to use the same tools I have been using, but you do need to produce quality output. Must be fluent in American english and our spellings.



- Must produce transcripts & caption files for every video, these must be proof-read for accuracy.

- Many of my videos I start a sentence, then restart it a couple of times. you must cleanly edit these.



I would like to grow my channel 
 if you'd like to take a look), but I need a solid and reliable video editor. 



- Create good youtube images

- Create the title

- Pick the keywords

- Write the description



And above all, it must be accessible, I have some standard operating procedures for you to use.



It's probably 10-15 hours a week or so.

title: Electrical Engineer / Quantity Surveyor - Remote
description:
About PropFix.ie



PropFix.ie is Ireland's trusted property maintenance specialist, offering comprehensive solutions with years of expertise across the construction and renovation sectors. We transform spaces through our diverse range of services, from handyman solutions and office fit-outs to complete renovations, house extensions, and specialized installations including doors, floors, and partitions.



Our commitment to delivering high-quality property maintenance and electrical solutions has made us a trusted partner for residential, commercial, and industrial clients nationwide. With decades of experience in electrical systems, installations, and maintenance, we take pride in our technical expertise and craftsmanship—ensuring our clients’ properties remain safe, efficient, and fully compliant with modern standards.



Role Overview



We are seeking a skilled and detail-oriented Electrical Engineer to join our team. This role involves electrical design, project coordination, system analysis, and technical documentation. The successful candidate will work closely with project managers, site teams, and clients to ensure accurate planning, safe installations, and seamless execution of all electrical works—from concept design to project completion.



Key Responsibilities

Electrical Engineering & Design



Electrical System Design: Develop, review, and interpret electrical plans, schematics, and load calculations.

Technical Specifications: Prepare detailed specifications, diagrams, SLDs (single-line diagrams), and layout drawings.

Material & Equipment Selection: Determine appropriate electrical components, materials, and equipment required for projects.

Compliance & Standards: Ensure designs meet electrical codes, safety standards, and regulatory requirements.



Project Coordination & Client Management



Site Coordination: Work with contractors, site engineers, and electricians to ensure proper installation and site execution.

Client Communication: Liaise with clients to clarify requirements, provide technical updates, and explain engineering decisions.

Documentation: Prepare project reports, progress updates, testing results, QA/QC records, and risk assessments.

Change Management: Document revisions to electrical plans and update load calculations, cost impacts, and schedules accordingly.



Testing, Maintenance & Quality Control



System Testing: Perform testing, commissioning, and troubleshooting of electrical systems and equipment.

Preventive Maintenance: Evaluate system performance and recommend maintenance schedules or upgrades.

Safety Compliance: Ensure all electrical work follows safety protocols, lock-out/tag-out procedures, and hazard assessments.



Financial Administration & Office Support



Cost Estimation: Prepare electrical cost estimates, material take-offs, and assist in budget planning.

Invoice & Documentation: Support invoicing, procurement coordination, and inventory updates for electrical materials.

Technical Records: Maintain accurate documentation, permits, and electrical certification records.



Required Skills & Experience

Technical Requirements



Electrical Engineering: Proven experience in electrical design, installation supervision, testing, and commissioning.

Codes & Standards: Strong understanding of local electrical codes, NEC/IEC standards, and safety regulations.

Technical Proficiency: Skilled in electrical drafting tools (AutoCAD, Revit MEP, or similar) and testing instruments.

Project Knowledge: Familiarity with construction processes, electrical layouts, and engineering documentation.

Professional Skills



Analytical Ability: Strong problem-solving and technical analysis skills.



Communication: Excellent verbal and written communication for client and contractor coordination.

Organization: Ability to handle multiple projects, documentation, and scheduling tasks efficiently.

Adaptability: Capable of managing both office-based work and technical project duties.



What We Offer



Competitive compensation package

Opportunities to work with clients across Ireland and the UK

Professional development and training programs

Collaborative and supportive remote work environment

Clear career advancement pathways

Exposure to diverse engineering and construction projects

Flexible remote working systems with comprehensive support



Please complete the attached application form and submit it along with your CV:

title: COLD CALLING FOR TEXAS ROOFING COMPANY
description:
We’re a Texas-based roofing company hiring more remote cold callers from the Philippines.

Details:

* Pay starts off at $3/hour and is a sliding scale based on performance every pay period.

2+ sales will result in $4/hour for that pay period, 4+ sales will result in $5/hour in that pay period. 



The average dialer should be prepared to make 2+ sales a week and be in the $4/hour pay scale on a regular basis. Hard workers can expect to regularly make it to the $5/hour pay scale. 



* Hours: 40+ hrs/week, Monday–Fri 11 AM – 8 PM CST and 9AM - 6PM CST on Saturdays. These are 8 hours days with a 1 hour unpaid lunch break.



Requirements:

Excellent English fluency + perfect American accent

Must have 1+ years experience in cold calling experience, preferably in the US roofing, real estate, or solar industry.



APPLICANTS THAT DO NOT MEET THESE REQUIREMENTS WILL NOT BE INTERVIEWED.



***You MUST reply with a 30 second video clip of yourself explaining your experience in the roofing & insurance claim industry in order to receive an interview.



This is for a well-established business that is expanding its already-proven model for cold calling.



We are conducting interviews every 9AM CST for the next 2 weeks and looking for people that are able to start immediately.

Respond to this application with a 30 second video of yourself explaining your experience in the cold calling industry and which mornings you are available for an interview.



-Graham

Roofing Solutions

title: Provider Credentialing & Insurance Enrollment Specialist
description:
About Us

 Insightful Psychiatry is a multi-state telepsychiatry group practice dedicated to expanding access to high-quality mental health care. We are rapidly onboarding new psychiatric providers and are seeking an experienced Credentialing & Enrollment Specialist to manage payer enrollment and ensure our clinicians are in-network to provide care.



Position Overview

The Credentialing & Enrollment Specialist will be responsible for managing all aspects of insurance enrollment and credentialing for our group NPI and individual providers. The ideal candidate has direct experience with commercial insurance payers and CAQH management, and can work independently to ensure timely and accurate enrollment.



Key Responsibilities

Manage credentialing and enrollment for new providers (PMHNPs, psychiatrists, etc.) across multiple states.

Maintain and update group and individual CAQH profiles, NPPES (NPI-1 & NPI-2), and payer portals.

Submit enrollment and recredentialing applications to insurance companies.

Track credentialing status, follow up with payers, and resolve application delays or issues.

Ensure compliance with payer requirements, delegated credentialing agreements, and practice standards.

Assist in adding new service locations and maintaining group contracts.

Coordinate with providers to collect necessary documents (licenses, malpractice insurance, CVs, etc.).

Provide regular updates and reporting to practice leadership.



Qualifications

2+ years of experience in insurance credentialing and enrollment (psychiatry/behavioral health experience preferred).

Strong knowledge of CAQH, NPPES, and payer enrollment workflows.

Experience with private/commercial insurance credentialing

Detail-oriented, highly organized, and proactive with follow-ups.

Ability to work independently in a remote setting.



Supportive, collaborative team environment.



How to Apply

Please submit your resume  highlighting your credentialing and insurance enrollment experience with multi-state medical practices.

title: Sales & Growth Representative (Airbnb Management)
description:
We are looking for a high-energy, persuasive Sales Representative to help scale our Airbnb management portfolio. Your primary goal is to identify property owners, pitch our management services, and convert them into long-term partners. You won't just be answering phones; you will be the "engine" of our company’s growth.



Key Responsibilities



Lead Generation: Cold call list of leads to find property owners who may be interested listing their property on Airbnb and other rental platforms to improve their ROI on rental properties.



    Outbound Prospecting: Cold calling,
ing, and messaging potential clients to set up discovery calls.



    Follow-up: Managing a CRM pipeline to ensure no lead goes cold.



    Onboarding Support: Assisting the owner through the initial contract phase before handing them off to operations.



### What We Are Looking For



    Experience: At least 1–2 years in Sales, Real Estate, or SaaS (Cold calling experience is a huge plus).



    Communication: Exceptional verbal and written English. You should be able to build rapport instantly.



    Tech Savvy: Familiarity with CRM tools like Lofty/Chime and WhatsApp/Slack.



    Knowledge: A basic understanding of how Airbnb/Short-Term Rentals work.



    The "Hustle": You are motivated by targets and don't get discouraged by the word "No."



### Compensation & Benefits



    Base Salary: $100/month



    Commission: $100 - $1000 per signed property contract depending on size of the property



    Growth: Opportunity to move into a Sales Manager role as we expand.

title: Video Editor
description:
Role Overview

If you enjoy turning ideas into high-performing content, understand what actually drives retention on YouTube and Instagram, and want real ownership over how a fast-growing brand shows up online—our Social Media Editor role is for you.

We are a large and rapidly scaling finance brand with over 500,000+ YouTube subscribers, known for strategic, high-value content and strong audience trust. As we continue expanding our reach and influence, we are investing in a strong in-house editing function to ensure our content not only looks polished—but performs at scale.



As our Social Media Editor, you will own the execution of both long-form and short-form video content across YouTube and Instagram. Your work will directly impact audience growth, retention, brand authority, and revenue. Success in this role is measured by output consistency, speed, content performance metrics, workflow efficiency, and the overall strength of our visual brand.



This is a hands-on, execution-focused role built for someone who thrives in a high-performance environment and wants true ownership over content production.



Key Responsibilities

Editing & Content Production

Edit 1–2 long-form YouTube videos per week

Edit 20+ short-form videos per week (YouTube Shorts, Instagram Reels)

Optimize all content for:

Strong hooks (first 1–3 seconds)





Content Mining & Strategy Support

Mine long-form footage for high-performing short-form clips

Identify emotionally compelling, value-dense, or viral 
nts

Structure clips natively for each platform (not recycled long-form)

Collaborate with leadership and strategy team on content direction



Workflow & Operational Ownership

Manage editing pipeline and weekly production calendar

Organize footage, assets, and editing files efficiently

Turn feedback quickly and accurately

Maintain clear communication with leadership and admins

Help scale short-form output while maintaining quality

Actively protect leadership time by owning the editing function end-to-end



Role Expectations

Independently manage weekly editing output without constant oversight

Hit volume targets consistently (1–2 long forms, 14+ shorts weekly)

Understand performance metrics and edit accordingly

Communicate clearly and proactively

Execute quickly in a fast-paced environment

Continuously refine style, systems, and workflow as the brand grows



Requirements

3+ years of experience editing short-form social media content

3+ years of experience editing long-form YouTube content

3+ years of social media video marketing experience

3+ years using CapCut, After Effects, or Final Cut Pro

Strong understanding of:

Hooks & retention psychology





Performance editing





YouTube and Instagram analytics





Brand positioning





Previous full-time dedication to editing (not hobby or occasional freelance)

Portfolio demonstrating strong short-form and long-form work

Ability to commit to this as a full-time role (no outside contract work)

Highly organized, efficient, and detail-oriented

Demonstrated ability to handle consistent weekly volume



Nice to Have

Experience editing for a large YouTube or Instagram brand

Experience working within the finance, business, or educational space

Experience working with influencers or authority-based creators

Familiarity with YouTube growth strategy and analytics optimization



Location

Remote (U.S.-based preferred)



Salary

5-10USD/hr

30+ hours per week





Benefits

Work-from-home flexibility

High-autonomy role with clear expectations

Direct access to leadership and growth opportunities

Collaborative, high-performance culture

Opportunity to grow with a major, established finance platform



Job Type

Full-time (Hourly)

title: Social Media/Digital Marketer
description:
We are looking for a creative, detail-oriented Social Media/Digital Marketer to join our team. This role is ideal for someone passionate about digital channels, content creation, and local SEO. You will be responsible for managing our online presence across various platforms and ensuring our digital footprint effectively supports our business goals.



Key Responsibilities:



A. Google Business Profile and Local Services Ad Management:

Maintain and optimize our Google Business Profile, ensuring accurate information, consistent updates, and active monitoring of local search rankings.



B. Social Media Management:

Oversee our social media accounts, including content planning, creation (with the use of AI tools), scheduling, and engagement to drive brand visibility and audience growth.



C. Website Management:

D. Ad Hoc Marketing Tasks:

title: Social Media Growth Manager
description:

• How you personally grow YT, TT and IG channels

• Show specific accounts you managed and results achieved

• Confirmation you manage editing and posting yourself



If chosen, your jobs will be to: grow our YouTube, Instagram, and TikTok channels using OUR content, while staying 100% on brand and fully compliant with each platform’s rules.



This job is NOT for you if:

1. If you're not a geek about algorithms and performance metrics

2. If your only experience is on smaller YT accounts with less than 50+k subscribers, IG accounts with less than 50+k followers, or TT accounts with less than 200+k followers

3. If you rely on scheduling tools as a growth strategy



This job is for you if you can:

• Take our raw video content and edit it perfectly for:

    - YouTube (long-form and shorts)

    - Instagram

    - TikTok



• Edit, post, optimize for channel growth

• Stay current on platform algorithms and growth strategies

• Be proactive with studying and testing hooks, pacing, captions, and formats

• Maintain strict brand consistency. Messaging, tone, colors, wording

• Meet weekly with the content host



Core responsibilities:

-Research

Study top-performing creators and content in our niche. Track what is working and why.



-Script Support

Help determine the best marketing hooks and topics based on your research in our industry.



-Edit and Upload

Edit videos and publish content across all platforms to maximize reach, retention, and growth.



Requirements:

• 1 plus years hands-on experience growing video-based social accounts

• Proven understanding of YouTube, Instagram, and TikTok algorithms

• Strong video editing skills focused on hooks and retention

• Fluent English

• Available during EST hours



This is a long-term role for the right person.

title: Cold Caller/Property Acquisition Specialist
description:
Distressed Property Acquisition Specialist



(Cold Caller & Closer | Real Base + Industry-Leading Commission | Build a Career, Not Just a Pipeline)



Are you ready to prove you can do it all—and be paid like you do?



Most of our top performers out-earn their base pay every month in commissions—because they produce, and they stay.

We’re building a long-term team of operators who own their pipeline, close their own deals, and grow with us as we scale.



What You’ll Do



100+ live outbound calls/day to distressed property owners (unpaid taxes, inherited, title issues, etc.)



Full-cycle ownership: From first contact through negotiation to close—no handoffs, no excuses



Pipeline management: You track every lead, every call, and every deal in real-time



Performance-driven: All numbers are tracked and visible; your income and advancement are tied to your results, not time-in-seat



What You Get



Real base pay (not a draw): To guarantee you’re supported while building your pipeline



Uncapped commission: Most of our best people double or triple their base every month—if you’re a producer, this is your arena



Leads, data, tech, and process: We remove the excuses; you bring the execution



Real growth: Producers become leaders, trainers, territory managers—if you prove it on the board, you move up fast



Long-term seat: We invest in those who consistently hit metrics and want a sales career, not a short-term gig



Who Succeeds Here



Operators who track their own numbers—and love the scoreboard



Professionals who crave direct feedback, thrive in a transparent environment, and want to build something, not just “do deals”



Anyone who’s performed in cold calling, full-cycle closing, and wants to see their income tied directly to what they produce



Who Shouldn’t Apply



Anyone needing long ramp-up, daily encouragement, or a “team sell” structure



People uncomfortable with public, daily reporting or being held to exact standards



Anyone not ready to own the whole pipeline—from hello to close



How to Apply (Must Complete Both Steps):



Resume: Clearly showing outbound calling and closing experience (include your highest daily call and deal numbers)



2-minute, unscripted voice memo: (no script, no edits)



Your name, country, and your personal record for calls in a day



Walk us through your best cold-to-close deal ever (steps, negotiation, and outcome)



Your personal system for tracking numbers and pipeline daily



Why you want a long-term, high-commission, high-performance sales seat—not “account management” or “just a job”



Applications missing either item, or not following instructions, will be rejected without review.



Bottom Line



If you’re a true operator who wants income, a real seat, and a future in a company that pays for performance—this is your next home.

If not, don’t apply.

title: Part?Time UGC Outreach & Creator Manager for DTC Cat Brand
description:
About Us



We’re a fast?growing DTC e?commerce brand that sells cat pheromone products to cat owners, primarily women in the US. We rely heavily on Meta ads and are building a high?volume creative machine.



We already have strong ad strategy and AI support for scripts and concepts. What we need now is a part?time UGC Outreach & Creator Manager who can find and manage creators and keep our UGC pipeline full and organized.

This role is about systems, communication, and follow?through, not “being the star” in front of the camera.



Role Overview



You will be responsible for:

* Finding and contacting new UGC creators (mainly cat/pet creators)

* Managing communication, deliverables, and deadlines

* Organizing all assets so our editors can work fast

We want to work directly with creators.?We do not use UGC platforms like Billo, Insense, etc. They add cost and complexity we don’t want. You will build and manage our own direct creator network.

This is a remote, part?time role (approx. 10–20 hours per week) with potential to grow if we’re a good fit.



Key Responsibilities



* Creator Prospecting & Outreach

    * Research and shortlist suitable UGC creators (mainly cat / pet niche, US & EU focus)

    * Collect contact details and basic info (followers, content style, etc.)

    * Send outreach DMs/emails using our templates and tone

    * Track responses and keep a clean creator pipeline

* Creator Management

    * Share our briefs & examples with creators

    * Align expectations on deliverables, timelines, and compensation

    * Follow up before deadlines, solve small issues, and keep projects moving

    * Maintain long?term relationships with top performers

* Organization & Handover

    * Maintain a simple but clean system (Sheets + Google Drive + ClickUp)

    * Make sure all raw videos and files are correctly named and stored

    * Tag assets to the right brief/hook so our editors know exactly what’s what

    * Update statuses so the team always sees what’s in progress and what’s delivered



Requirements



* Excellent written English (you will be writing DMs/emails to creators)

* Experience working with UGC creators / influencers / content creators

* Strong organizational skills: you enjoy keeping lists, trackers, and deadlines in order

* Comfortable working with:

    * Google Sheets & Google Drive

    * Basic project tools (ClickUp, Asana, Trello, or similar)

* Proactive communicator: you don’t wait to be chased, you update and follow up

Nice to have (not required but a plus):

* Experience with DTC / e?commerce brands

* Pet / cat niche interest

* Basic understanding of performance ads (hooks, scroll?stoppers, etc.)



What We Offer



* Long?term collaboration with a serious, growing DTC brand

* Clear processes, templates, and examples

* Flexible part?time hours as long as deadlines are hit

* Direct work with the founder and creative team



How to Apply



Please start your application with “NO PLATFORMS” so we know you read this.

Include:

1. A short intro: who you are and your relevant experience with UGC / creators

2. 1–2 examples of projects where you coordinated creators or managed UGC

3. The tools you currently use for:

    * Organizing your work (PM / task tools)

    * Tracking creators / campaigns

4. Your weekly availability (hours + timezone) and your desired hourly rate



We’ll invite shortlisted candidates to a paid test task (creator research + outreach + simple tracking setup) so both sides can see if it’s a good fit.

title: Sales & Outreach Executive
description:
Remote | Full-Time | UK Hours



Build and Develop Your Career With a Growing UK Brokerage



We are hiring a Sales & Outreach Executive to support our campaign delivery and client acquisition work.



This role is ideal for someone experienced in B2B outreach who enjoys structured campaigns, research-led messaging, and relationship building, without the pressure of cold calling.



You will play an important operational role, helping us run and optimise outbound acquisition campaigns for both our clients and our own brokerage.



About our company - Think Acquisition 



We are a specialist UK business brokerage focused on the property management and services sector, including but not limited to:



- Estate & letting agencies

- Property management companies

- Block management firms

- Short-term accommodation operators



We help business owners grow through acquisition and support founders when they d
 to sell.



We are a five-year-old company with ambitious growth plans to become the leading brokerage in this niche across the UK.



Our Team



You will be joining a small, close-knit international team of five, and we are now hiring our sixth tea
mber to support outreach campaign delivery and help bring everything together operationally.



We operate remotely but communicate closely, and we value reliability, trust, and consistency.



Our Culture



We are ambitious and growth-focused, but we also value our team.



The directors personally enjoy learning, travelling and investing in personal development. They have personally travelled across the Philippines, including Cebu, El Nido and Manila, so have an understanding of the culture, assisting in understanding their employees' ways of working and common challenges.



We reward strong performance, provide long-term stability, and aim to create an environment where tea
mbers can grow with the business. We are big believers of continous improvement and will invest in the relevant tools and training where suitable to help us all grow.



At the same time, we are serious about our goals and expect professionalism, accountability and high standards.



Role Overview



We run structured multi-channel (Letter,
, LinkedIn) outreach campaigns targeting business owners across the UK.



Campaigns are already templated and strategised. Your role is to manage, monitor and optimise them to ensure they run smoothly and generate conversations.



You will not be selling directly or calling prospects. All outreach is conducted behind the director or company profiles.



Key Responsibilities



- Multichannel Campaign Management

- Set up outreach campaigns across
 and LinkedIn platforms

- Schedule and sequence messaging

- Monitor campaign performance

- Ensure deliverability and platform health

- Make manual tweaks and adjustments where required

- Personalised Outreach
 & Messaging

- Apply light personalisation to templated messaging

- Use internal research to tailor messages

- Improve response rates

- Inbound & Conversation Handling

- Respond professionally to early-stage interest

- Route qualified prospects to directors

- Book appointments where appropriate

- Maintain accurate CRM records

- Track outreach metrics and response rates

- Support campaign reporting



Important Clarification



This role does not involve:



- Cold calling

- Selling over the phone

- Closing deals



All outreach is written and executed behind company accounts. Your role is campaign management, messaging and conversation handling.



Skills & Experience



Required

- Strong written English

- Experience in B2B outreach or lead generation

- Organised and process-driven

- Confident in communicating professionally

- High attention to detail

- Reliable and self-motivated



Preferred

- 5+ years of sales or outreach experience

- LinkedIn Sales Navigator

- Apollo or similar data tools

- Instantly.ai or
 sequencing platforms

- G-Suite User Experience

- Desire to win 



Working Structure



- Remote, work from home

- Full-time role

- Operating primarily within UK working hours

- Long-term position with stability



What You Will Receive



- Regular biweekly pay

- 28 days paid annual leave

- Long-term, stable engagement

- Flexibility where reasonable

- Direct support from founders

- Paid tools, software and subscriptions where required

- Equipment support if needed

- Opportunity to grow with a scaling UK business brokerage



We believe in rewarding loyalty and performance as the company grows.



Application Process



To apply, please submit:



Your CV and any other supporting material.



Shortlisted applicants will be invited to interview, followed by a short practical outreach task.



Please include the phrase Red Dragon in your application so we know you have read the full advert.

title: Virtual Executive Assistant
description:
I'm the founder of a digital growth marketing company that helps mission-driven founders scale their businesses with more ease & less overwhelm - and I'm looking for a small team of highly-skilled Executive Assistants to help take over the marketing and management tasks that make a huge difference in the lives of the people that hire us.



I'm looking for a max of 5 amazing executive assistants available for part-time (potential for full time) with a salary starting at $500 USD per month and with long term success and robust training, moving up to $700 USD per month as an emerging leader in the company.



If you have the following skill sets, I encourage you to apply:



REQUIRED EXPERIENCE:

- Minimum of 3–5 years of experience in Digital Marketing, Video Editing, Social Media Management, Content Creation, and Executive Assistant Work (Administrative Tasks, Calendar &
 Management, etc)

You’re trusted to manage marketing deliverables while providing high-level executive support, keeping priorities organized, systems moving, and leadership focused on growth instead of day-to-day execution. You've done it all from managing schedules to
 & calendar management. You have a meticulous eye for detail where Prioritization and Organization are your love language



-- 1+ years of experience in Sales Funnels and Shopify

You're a professional who is passionate about helping changemakers simplify their lives by setting up systems that will allow them to operate their businesses with more ease and less overwhelm. You have experience with sales funnel and CRM software



- 1+ years of experience advertising on platforms like Instagram,
, Tik Tok, within a Marketing team consisting of Paid Acquisition, Organic Marketing, Customer Retention, & Product Marketing

You're an emerging leader who has the potential to head a team in the future that will report directly to you. Having leadership experience is a MAJOR plus



- Creating SOPs (Standard Operating Procedures)

You’ll ensure each business function has detailed documentation for repeatable and scalable growth if it isn't already place. If you see gaps, you take the initiative to fill them and produce results without anyone knowing there was an issue (yea, all that and a bag of chips :-)



- Experience working at a digital/online product/platform: You’re familiar with online courses, digital products & platforms and popular tools in the business space ranging from landing page builders and
 service providers to CRMs, and course hosting platforms aren’t foreign to you (We teach tools like Shopify, Convertkit, Kajabi, Teachable, Learnworlds, Calendly, etc)



ABOUT YOU:

- “You down with SOP? Yeah you know me!”—You’re an advocate for SOPs (Standard Operating Procedures) to make our systems repeatable & scalable.

- Your love language is processes & predictable, meteoric growth. We never question company progress towards the quarterly and yearly goals because you keep real-time metrics for all projects.

- You’re aware of new software and can look at current systems and identify how to automate tasks a company has been doing manually for months.

- You’re addicted to digital processes & automation in the world of social media because you love building connections in the digital space and you’ve seen how powerful it can be in business growth

- You’re driven by metrics & tracking. You know that you can’t improve something unless you measure it, so you develop ways to measure performance so your company is always predictably improving.

- Timeliness and deadlines are your jam. When we have a team call at 10:00am, you show up at 9:55am. When the deadline is Tuesday at 5:30pm, you have it done Monday.

- You overcommunicate clearly and confidently. If you agree/disagree with something, you communicate that without hesitation or overthinking. You’re no stranger to asking why we do things a certain way to ensure we’re intentional with our resources.

- You’re a leader and team player. Ego? What ego? If something needs to be done, you dive in to make sure all critical tasks are accounted and cared for.

title: Virtual Executive Assistant
description:
I'm the founder of a digital growth marketing company that helps mission-driven founders scale their businesses with more ease & less overwhelm - and I'm looking for a small team of highly-skilled Executive Assistants to help take over the marketing and management tasks that make a huge difference in the lives of the people that hire us.



I'm looking for a max of 5 amazing executive assistants available for part-time (potential for full time) with a salary starting at $500 USD per month and with long term success and robust training, moving up to $700 USD per month as an emerging leader in the company.



If you have the following skill sets, I encourage you to apply:



REQUIRED EXPERIENCE:

- Minimum of 3–5 years of experience in Digital Marketing, Video Editing, Social Media Management, Content Creation, and Executive Assistant Work (Administrative Tasks, Calendar &
 Management, etc)

You’re trusted to manage marketing deliverables while providing high-level executive support, keeping priorities organized, systems moving, and leadership focused on growth instead of day-to-day execution. You've done it all from managing schedules to
 & calendar management. You have a meticulous eye for detail where Prioritization and Organization are your love language



-- 1+ years of experience in Sales Funnels and Shopify

You're a professional who is passionate about helping changemakers simplify their lives by setting up systems that will allow them to operate their businesses with more ease and less overwhelm. You have experience with sales funnel and CRM software



- 1+ years of experience advertising on platforms like Instagram,
, Tik Tok, within a Marketing team consisting of Paid Acquisition, Organic Marketing, Customer Retention, & Product Marketing

You're an emerging leader who has the potential to head a team in the future that will report directly to you. Having leadership experience is a MAJOR plus



- Creating SOPs (Standard Operating Procedures)

You’ll ensure each business function has detailed documentation for repeatable and scalable growth if it isn't already place. If you see gaps, you take the initiative to fill them and produce results without anyone knowing there was an issue (yea, all that and a bag of chips :-)



- Experience working at a digital/online product/platform: You’re familiar with online courses, digital products & platforms and popular tools in the business space ranging from landing page builders and
 service providers to CRMs, and course hosting platforms aren’t foreign to you (We teach tools like Shopify, Convertkit, Kajabi, Teachable, Learnworlds, Calendly, etc)



ABOUT YOU:

- “You down with SOP? Yeah you know me!”—You’re an advocate for SOPs (Standard Operating Procedures) to make our systems repeatable & scalable.

- Your love language is processes & predictable, meteoric growth. We never question company progress towards the quarterly and yearly goals because you keep real-time metrics for all projects.

- You’re aware of new software and can look at current systems and identify how to automate tasks a company has been doing manually for months.

- You’re addicted to digital processes & automation in the world of social media because you love building connections in the digital space and you’ve seen how powerful it can be in business growth

- You’re driven by metrics & tracking. You know that you can’t improve something unless you measure it, so you develop ways to measure performance so your company is always predictably improving.

- Timeliness and deadlines are your jam. When we have a team call at 10:00am, you show up at 9:55am. When the deadline is Tuesday at 5:30pm, you have it done Monday.

- You overcommunicate clearly and confidently. If you agree/disagree with something, you communicate that without hesitation or overthinking. You’re no stranger to asking why we do things a certain way to ensure we’re intentional with our resources.

- You’re a leader and team player. Ego? What ego? If something needs to be done, you dive in to make sure all critical tasks are accounted and cared for.



If you’re nodding your head “Yes” to the above, proceed below to apply.



PERKS:

I'm committed to setting our staff up for success with access to trainings that will certify your skills in:

- Task & Calendar Management

- Launch/Sales Strategy Planning

- Sales Funnel Tech Setup (For E-Commerce or Service Based Businesses)

- Social Media Management

- Digital Media Marketing (Including
 and SMS Marketing)

- Lead Generation



After one week of training and assessment, you're officially certified under our internal training program, which means hitting the ground running with your new skills. Perks include:

- Part time work hours

- Work from anywhere in the world (as long as your internet signal is strong and computer is fast)

- Starting Salary at $500 USD a month ($6000 USD annual)

title: Land Comping Specialist (Remote – Full Time/Part Time)
description:
About the Role



We are a U.S.-based land investing company that buys and sells vacant land across the United States. We are looking for a sharp, detail-oriented Land Comping Specialist to join our team. Your primary role will be to quickly and accurately evaluate comparable parcels to determine market value and identify key property characteristics that affect that value.



Speed and accuracy are critical — you should be able to comp a property in approximately 1 minute once trained on our system.



Responsibilities

 • Comp vacant land parcels using platforms including Redfin, Zillow, LandPortal, PropStream, 
, LandWatch, and county assessor/GIS websites

 • Use Google Earth / Google Maps to visually assess properties

 • Identify and flag the following property characteristics:

 • Road access — does the parcel have legal and physical access?

 • Landlocked parcels — no access to a public road

 • Flood zone status — using FEMA flood maps or PropStream

 • Paved vs. dirt/gravel road frontage

 • Topography — flat, sloped, heavily wooded, wetlands, etc.

 • Utilities availability — water, sewer, electric nearby

 • Zoning — residential, agricultural, commercial, or mixed use

 • HOA/POA — whether the parcel is in a subdivision with dues or restrictions

 • Lot size and dimensions — usability of the land

 • Nearby comparables — recent sold comps and active listings

 • Days on market of comparable listings

 • Price per acre analysis

 • Proximity to towns, cities, highways, or amenities

 • Environmental issues — wetlands, easements, mineral rights, etc.

 • In-fill lots vs. rural parcels — understanding the difference in valuation

 • Assist with outbound marketing campaigns for land wholesaling/flipping (make outbound offers via text to start)

 • Communicate findings clearly in our tracking spreadsheet or CRM

 • Flag red flags or deal-killers quickly



Requirements

 • Experience comping vacant land (not just residential homes) strongly preferred

 • Familiarity with U.S. land investing, wholesaling, or flipping is a big plus

 • Proficient with Redfin, Zillow, PropStream, LandPortal, 
, LandWatch, Google Earth

 • Comfortable navigating county assessor, GIS, and tax websites

 • Strong attention to detail and ability to work quickly

 • Reliable internet connection and computer

 • Excellent English communication (written)

 • Experience with outbound marketing campaigns (mail, cold calling lists, or data management) is a bonus



Nice to Have

 • Experience with tools like REI Conversion, Pebble, FreedomSoft, Podio, or Airtable

 • Background in real estate virtual assistance

 • Knowledge of FEMA flood map lookup (
)

 • Familiarity with land-specific comping challenges (sparse comps, large acreage adjustments, rural markets)



Compensation

 • Competitive hourly rate based on experience

 • Long-term opportunity for the right candidate

 • Performance bonuses possible



To Apply



Please send a short video or voice message introducing yourself and describing your experience with land comping or real estate data research. Include examples of tools you’ve used and your typical turnaround time per property to

title: Cold Email Outreach & Lead Generation Manager
description:
About Us:

We are a growing digital marketing agency specializing in innovative outreach strategies to drive high-quality leads and sales for our clients. We are seeking an experienced Cold
 Outreach & Lead Generation Manager to join our team. This role will oversee cold
 campaigns and lead generation efforts, leveraging GoHighLevel (GHL) to optimize campaign performance and generate high-quality leads that convert.



Job Overview:

As the Cold
 Outreach & Lead Generation Manager, you will be responsible for developing and executing effective cold
 campaigns and comprehensive lead generation strategies. You’ll manage the entire outreach process from prospect research to
 automation, tracking, and performance analysis. This role requires strong proficiency with GoHighLevel (GHL) and a solid understanding of how to identify, nurture, and convert leads into valuable opportunities for our clients.



Key Responsibilities:



Cold
 Campaign Strategy: Develop and implement cold
 strategies to generate leads, engaging potential prospects, nurturing them through sequences, and driving conversion.



Lead Generation & Prospecting: Identify high-quality leads through targeted outreach, research, and leveraging various online tools, databases, and social platforms.



GHL Expertise: Manage
 campaigns through GoHighLevel (GHL), including automating workflows, scheduling
s, and tracking KPIs such as open rates, click-through rates, and response rates.



Lead Nurturing: Build and implement lead nurturing campaigns using
 automation to ensure a continuous pipeline of qualified leads and opportunities for sales teams.



Segmentation & Personalization: Utilize audience segmentation techniques to personalize
 outreach based on buyer personas, behaviors, and demographics to increase engagement and conversion rates.



A/B Testing & Optimization: Conduct ongoing A/B testing on subject lines,
 copy, call-to-action buttons, and sending times to improve campaign performance and lead conversion.



Lead Qualification: Implement lead scoring and qualification systems to prioritize high-potential leads for follow-up by the sales team.



Metrics & Reporting: Regularly monitor and report on the effectiveness of outreach campaigns and lead generation efforts, providing actionable insights to optimize future campaigns.



Compliance & Best Practices: Ensure all outreach campaigns are compliant with relevant regulations (e.g., GDPR, CAN-SPAM) and follow best practices for deliverability, list hygiene, and lead qualification.



Collaboration: Work cross-functionally with the sales, marketing, and content teams to align outreach messaging and ensure seamless lead handoff.



Scaling & Automation: Identify opportunities to scale lead generation efforts, automate repetitive tasks, and improve the overall efficiency of the outreach process.



Qualifications:



Experience: 3+ years of experience in cold
 outreach, lead generation, or digital marketing, with a proven track record of successfully managing
 campaigns and generating leads.



GoHighLevel (GHL): Proficiency in using GoHighLevel (GHL) to automate campaigns, manage workflows, and track lead data.



Lead Generation Expertise: Deep understanding of lead generation techniques, including prospect research, segmentation, lead qualification, and conversion strategies.



 Deliverability & Optimization: Knowledge of best practices for
 deliverability, lead nurturing, and optimizing
 campaigns to drive engagement and conversions.



Data-Driven: Strong ability to analyze campaign performance metrics and adjust strategies for continuous improvement in lead generation and outreach.



Attention to Detail: Excellent organizational skills and ability to manage multiple campaigns and lead-generation workflows effectively.



Strong Communication Skills: Ability to write compelling, personalized
 copy that resonates with different target audiences and drives responses.



Problem-Solving Skills: Quick to identify and resolve issues related to lead generation or campaign performance.



Preferred Skills (not required but beneficial):



Experience with other outreach or lead-generation tools like Lemlist, 
, or ActiveCampaign.



Knowledge of integrations between GHL and other tools (e.g., Zapier, Google Analytics, etc.).



Familiarity with industries such as SaaS, eCommerce, or B2B.



Knowledge of lead scoring and CRM best practices.



Must work
CST

title: Senior (L3 / Technical Lead)
description:
We’re hiring an L3 Technical Lead to drive escalations, standards, and technical execution in an MSP environment. This is a hands-on senior role for someone who can solve complex issues end-to-end, communicate clearly on client calls, and lead/support L1/L2 technicians.



Non-negotiables:



Excellent spoken English (you will be on calls).



MSP-level expertise across Microsoft products, virtualization/hypervisors, backups, and RMM/PSA operations.



Ability to work CST 8am–4pm consistently.



Responsibilities

L3 Escalations / Engineering



Resolve advanced issues across Microsoft 365, Windows Server, identity, networking, virtualization, and backups.

Perform root cause analysis (RCA), implement permanent fixes, and reduce repeat tickets.

Lead or support projects: onboardings, migrations, remediation, standardization.

MSP Tooling & Process (RMM/PSA)

Work efficiently inside a PSA: proper ticket updates, time entries, SLAs, client communication.

Use RMM tools for monitoring, remediation, patching, scripting, and automation.

Improve documentation and SOPs/runbooks for consistent service delivery.



Technical Leadership

Provide guidance and mentoring to L1/L2; raise quality and speed of resolution.

Help define standards and best practices across client environments.

Communicate clearly with clients and internal stakeholders (verbal + written).

Required Experience & Skills

Must-Have

3–5+ years MSP experience (or equivalent multi-client support).

Strong verbal English with confidence on calls (clear accent, professional tone).

Deep knowledge of Microsoft stack, including:

Microsoft 365 (Exchange Online, Teams, SharePoint/OneDrive)

Windows Server, Active Directory, Group Policy, DNS/DHCP

Strong troubleshooting discipline (logs, structured diagnosis, documentation).

Hypervisors / Virtualization

Experience supporting VMware and/or Hyper-V 

VM performance + storage troubleshooting, snapshots, host issues.

Backup / Disaster Recovery

Experience with MSP-grade backup platforms (e.g., Veeam, Datto, Acronis, MSP360, etc.).

Backup verification, restore testing, DR planning, ransomware-aware practices.



RMM / PSA

Hands-on experience with at least one PSA and one RMM (examples below).

Ability to manage workflow, priorities, and documentation at MSP standards.

Examples (not required all):

PSA: ConnectWise Manage, Autotask, HaloPSA, Freshservice/Jira Service Mgmt

RMM: NinjaOne, ConnectWise Automate, Datto RMM, Kaseya, N-able



Nice-to-Have

PowerShell automation (M365 user/admin tasks, remediation scripts).

Security tooling exposure (EDR,
 security, basic SIEM).

Azure IaaS / hybrid environments.



What We’re Looking For

Ownership mindset: you take problems to completion.

Strong customer communication: concise, calm, and clear.

Documentation-first: fixes are repeatable and understandable.

Can lead technically without ego; coaches others effectively.



Compensation

Competitive, based on experience and interview performance.

Please include your expected monthly rate.



How to Apply (Required)

Please provide:



Resume/CV



A 30sec - 1 minute voice or Loom recording answering:

Your MSP background



Your strongest Microsoft area (real example)

A complex escalation you solved (steps + outcome)

List your RMM/PSA tools and how long you used each

Your PC specs, headset/mic confirmation, and internet speed



Confirm you can work CST 8:00am–4:00pm

title: eCommerce Growth Expert
description:
Own Category Growth, Optimize Performance, and Expand Market Dominance.



Hadley Designs is seeking a Growth Expert to take full ownership of a multi-million dollar product category, with Amazon as the primary growth channel. This is a high-impact role for a results-driven e-commerce operator who thrives on ownership, accountability, and driving measurable growth through disciplined execution and data-backed decision-making.



While this role operates deeply within Amazon, we welcome candidates who have driven growth across e-commerce, DTC, or marketplace environments and are excited to apply that experience within a scaled Amazon ecosystem.



How You’ll Win at Hadley Designs:

We believe performance comes from strong systems executed consistently.



Every eCommerce Growth Expert is expected to progress through three stages:



- Learn the Playbook – Understand our category strategy, operating standards, and decision frameworks

- Apply the Playbook – Execute accurately and consistently to deliver predictable, scalable results

- Enhance the Playbook – Improve systems with new ideas and strategies after mastery is demonstrated



This order matters. We value innovation, but only when it is grounded in proven execution. Our playbook exists to help high performers win faster, create leverage, and scale impact — not slow them down.



To formally apply, apply HERE:

title: Graphic Designer (Print-on-Demand Etsy) – Color/Font Expert + Etsy Research (Part-Time ? Full-Time)
description:
Job Title: Graphic Designer (Print-on-Demand Etsy) – Color/Font Expert + Etsy Research (Part-Time ? Full-Time)



We are looking for an experienced Graphic Designer for a Print-on-Demand project on Etsy. You should be passionate about strong color design, excellent typography (fonts), and creating high-converting t-shirt designs for specific niches.



What we need from you

- You are an excellent graphic designer (clean, modern, market-ready designs)

- Strong skills in color design and typography/fonts

- Solid experience with Etsy + Print-on-Demand

- You know how to do Etsy keyword research (for titles/tags) and understand Etsy SEO basics

- You can do niche research, product research, and trend checks for t-shirt designs

- You understand how to build designs that actually sell (not just “pretty” designs)



Your responsibilities

- Create and iterate t-shirt designs based on niche/keyword research

- Support with Etsy research: keywords, niches, product opportunities

- Prepare print-ready files (and variations if needed)

- Communicate proactively and reliably (daily updates when we work together)



What kind of person fits this role

- Very communicative, friendly, open-minded

- Reliable and consistent (deadlines matter)

- Team player who enjoys long-term collaboration

- You want to grow with a project (and not just do random one-off gigs)



Working hours & growth path

- We start with 10 hours per week

- If the project is successful, we increase the workload month by month: +10 hours each month until we reach full-time

- Long-term partnership is the goal

- We already have Filipino tea
mbers and we work very well together



How to apply

Please send:

1) Your portfolio (best t-shirt / POD work + typography-heavy designs)  

2) A short note about your Etsy + POD experience (what results you’ve achieved / what you worked on)  

3) Your process for keyword + niche research on Etsy (tools, steps)  

4) Your hourly rate expectation (USD/hour) in your very first message



If you read until here, start your application message with: “Hi Wolf”.

title: Wahuza/SIEM/ELK Expert
description:

We already pay for 24/7 SOC so this isn't a first line solution. Syslog collection, SNMP, and SIEM are all side benefits for us.



Please bid on this with both a total price & time estimate. You may work on this any time you wish, but our daily recap meetings must be held durring CST 8am - 5pm for 5minute to let us know how it's gonig.

Customer Communication

Reply to text messages, Instagram DMs, and
s

Follow up with customers who stop responding

Collect Information
