You don’t need to know how to cut videos or design statics yourself. We have editors and designers for that. But you should know exactly what makes a high-converting ad work and be able to explain it in a structured way.



We are looking for someone who has already done this or something very similar. If you’ve been a creative strategist at an agency, or have run creative strategy internally for a growing brand, this is exactly the kind of background we want.



This is a growth-oriented environment. You’ll be developing creative strategies that help brands scale beyond 7–8 figures per month. We are looking for long-term partners, not a quick freelance gig.



To apply, please answer this form:

title: International Sales & AI Business Development Associate
description:
We are MSTR, an AI software company based in the Netherlands. We build custom AI-driven applications that help businesses work smarter and more intelligently, from first conversation to production-ready product.



Our team has around 16 people: a customer-facing team of six here in the Netherlands, and ten developers based in the Philippines. Right now, all of our sales happen in the Netherlands. We're ready to change that, and we're looking for the person to help us do it.



What this role is:

We're building our international sales track from the ground up, and we're looking for a driven person to lead that effort alongside Tom, our co-founder. Your focus will be on international markets, though you'll occasionally support the Dutch market too, where we use AI to help bridge language and communication gaps.



This is early-stage work. There's no existing international playbook to follow. You'll build it. Tom will be involved in calls and strategy, but the initiative and day-to-day hustle is yours.



What you'll actually be doing:

- Reaching out to prospects via phone,
, LinkedIn, and whatever creative approaches you come up with

- Building and running AI-powered lead generation pipelines

- Creating marketing materials that help us tell our story

- Challenging our thinking and bringing new ideas to the table

- Growing into a genuine AI expert who can have real conversations with business owners about what's possible



Who we're looking for:

Someone who communicates exceptionally well in English, is comfortable reaching out cold, and gets genuinely excited about building something new rather than maintaining something existing. You pick up new things fast, you're curious about AI and what it can do for businesses, and you want a role where your results are visible and your responsibility grows with them.



Experience in sales helps, but it's not the point. The right attitude, communication skills, and willingness to figure things out matter far more.



We assess candidates through a short video introduction rather than long application forms. If this sounds interesting, send us a 3 to 7 minute video answering:

1. A brief intro about yourself and what drives you

2. Your experience with talking to clients, selling, or any customer-facing work

3. What excites you about working at an AI company right now

4. How you approach learning something completely new

5. What you're looking for in your next role and where you see yourself long-term



No polish needed. We're looking for clarity, energy, and authenticity. Please don't read from a script.

Upload your video to Google Drive, Dropbox, or YouTube (unlisted) and share the link. Optionally include your CV or LinkedIn.



Please send everything to 
 are happy to answer any questions.



We are looking forward to hearing from you.

title: AML Consultant (Full time, Remote Work)

We are looking for an experienced AML Consultant based in the Philippines to join us on an 8 month fixed term contract, with the possibility of extension depending on business needs at the time.

What you will be doing

- Supporting compliance frameworks aligned to New Zealand and Australian AML legislation

- Collaborating with internal stakeholders to ensure documentation is accurate, consistent, and fit for purpose



What we are looking for

- Proven experience working in AML or financial crime compliance

- Strong understanding of AML legislation and regulatory expectations

- Demonstrated experience with risk assessments and policy or procedure writing

- Excellent written communication skills with the ability to produce clear, structured documents

What we offer

- Exposure to complex and meaningful AML work across multiple jurisdictions

- Ongoing learning and professional development opportunities

- Possibility of contract extension based on business needs



If you enjoy structured thinking, clear writing, and building strong compliance foundations, we would love to hear from you.

title: Web Developer
description:
We are looking for a Web Developer with strong SEO awareness to build, optimize, and maintain high-performance websites that scale in search visibility and technical quality.



You will work closely with SEO strategists, content teams, and designers to ensure that websites are crawlable, indexable, fast, and semantically structured, while maintaining clean code and excellent user experience.



Responsibilities

 • Develop and maintain websites with SEO-first architecture and clean HTML structure

 • Implement technical SEO best practices (Core Web Vitals, crawl efficiency, indexing control)

 • Optimize page speed, rendering, and server responses (CWV, lazy loading, caching)

 • Ensure proper use of semantic HTML (H1–H6 hierarchy, internal linking, contextual components)

 • Implement and maintain structured data (JSON-LD)

 • Work with log files, redirects, canonicals, pagination, and hreflang

 • Collaborate with SEO teams on scalable, programmatic page generation

 • Identify and fix technical SEO issues across large websites



Requirements

 • Strong experience with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and modern web standards

 • Experience with WordPress or similar CMS platforms

 • Solid understanding of technical SEO fundamentals

 • Familiarity with Core Web Vitals, Lighthouse, and PageSpeed Insights

 • Ability to work on large websites with thousands of URLs

 • Attention to detail and clean, maintainable code practices



Nice to Have

 • Experience with programmatic SEO or large-scale content systems

 • Knowledge of server-side rendering, caching layers, or CDN setups

 • Familiarity with SEO tools (Search Console, log analysis, crawlers)



This role is ideal for a developer who understands that code quality, performance, and SEO are deeply connected, and wants to build websites that perform well both for users and search engines.

title: Long-form content Voice-Over and Visuals Generator
description:
I am looking for a person who can help me with the following 2 tasks:

1. Generating a FLAWLESS A.I. V.O. for my 55-65 minute videos

2. Generate me x amount of images and videos.



Important notes:

- Quality will be of utmost importance, The Voice-Over needs to be 100% flawless and natural sounding.



Once you get the job:

- You will be provided with access to a Leonardo AI account to create the visuals.

- You will get access to an AI Voice-Over generating account to create the Voice-Over



On average, it should take you about 3 to 4-hours to create 1 batch. You will need to deliver 1 batch every 2 days on the topic & script that I will send you.

Make sure to mention your favorite food in the application title so that I know you have read through this.



Since quality is of utmost importance, I will need you to create a sample for me of about 5-7 minutes so that I know what to expect from you. I will provide you with a folder containing all the necessities to create the sample.



It is up to you to provide the sample using your own tools. (sample should be about 5-7 minutes + some visuals to give me an idea of what you can deliver.





Experience Requirements:

- Generating Voice-Overs using tools like ElevenLabs, etc. 

- Creating ideal prompts for great visuals (static images & video visuals)



To get considered faster, you are welcome to send me a drive link with deep space visuals (orbiting planets, distant planets, nebula's. galaxies, REALISTIC exoplanet surfaces, starry skies, etc.). The visuals need to be realistic, fitting for a documentary style video.



You will be working on 15 batches a month. So the pay is about $4.66 an hour for just getting the Voice-Over quality right and creating some fitting images, which takes about 3 hours once you've gotten the hang of it.

You will work closely with the Director and help streamline the process by managing information, tracking deadlines, and ensuring no case is left behind.



Skills & Experience



- Experience as a Case Manager, Mortgage Administrator, or similar role (preferred)

- Good understanding of the UK mortgage process or willing to learn

- Excellent written and spoken English

- Very organised and detail-oriented

- Able to update and manage multiple cases daily

- Strong problem-solving and follow-up skills

- Can work independently with minimal supervision



Technical Requirements



- Proficient in Microsoft Office (Teams, Word, Excel, Outlook)

- Comfortable using CRMs (ideally Smartr365) and Trello

- Can learn new lender systems and portals quickly



Equipment Needed



- Laptop

- Reliable high-speed internet



Work Qualities



- Professional and client-friendly communication

- Trustworthy with sensitive financial documents

- Able to stay calm under pressure and meet deadlines

- Proactive and able to anticipate next steps in each case

- Able to collaborate with other tea
mbers to get the job done



To apply: send a short video answering the following questions:

- What does Resie Mortgages and Protection do?

- Why you would make a good case manager, including any experience?

- Tell us about an apple shortcut that would be useful in this role?

- Where do you see yourself in 3 years time?

- Why we should take you to interview stage?

- A joke that will make us laugh?

title: DM Businesses To Schedule Appointment
description:
** PLEASE READ THE ENTIRE DESCRIPTION BEFORE CONTACTING **



Hey I am Jordan - the founder of a fast-growing company that helps small businesses never miss a call using an A.I. Receptionist. This is a no-brainer service that every business needs, and I am looking for sharks to help me introduce it to small business owners.



We are not a huge corporate where you are just a number. I am only looking for 2-3 people to closely work with to make sure you are setup for success.



WHAT YOU’LL DO



- Source your own leads

- DM small business owners on social media and book them for a free consultation

- That’s it. You do NOT close deals - our closing team handles everything. Your only job is getting them to show up.



MUST HAVE ( Do Not Contact If This Does Not Describe You )

- Experience doing cold out reach messaging business owners

- Reliable internet

- Quiet workspace

- Excellent grammer

- Put the phrase "message and smile" as your subject so we know you read this



COMPENSATION

- We offer 2 pay plans:

$2/Hour + $25/Signup

OR

$200 per signup (no hourly)

- Monthly performance bonuses also



WHO WE ARE LOOKING FOR

- Someone who knows how to communicate, follow up, and book appointments

- Comfortable messaging with business owners all day



HOURS

- Part-time (20 hours/week)

- 2:00 AM – 6:00 AM Philippine Time



ONLY APPLY IF

- You’re a hustler

- You’re motivated by huge commissions 

- You have the discipline to work independently and make it happen



SUMMARY

- It only takes finding 3-4 business owners a month to make $600-$800 plus bonuses (and that is for PART TIME work).



CONTACT

- Do not just copy and paste a generic message, I read each one individually to see if you are a good fit

- Tell me 2 specific things: Your prior B2B experience AND why specifically this role works for you

title: US HR Operations Specialist (US HR & Financial Experience Required)
description:
We are seeking a detail-oriented, analytical, and service-driven HR Operations Specialist with financial experience to support our clients across financial reporting, HR operations, payroll, and compliance.



We are a management consulting company that supports small business owners who want to grow sustainably without taking on equity investors. We support growth strategy, finance, operations, human resources, and systems related to those areas, for a wide variety of business types. We typically start with businesses when they reach US$500,000 - $2 million in revenues and stay with them until they are ready to hire senior leaders, at $10-$15 million.



You’ll work directly with the company’s CEO and our small business owner clients, helping them understand their numbers, streamline back-office functions, and stay compliant with state and federal requirements. This role is ideal for someone who enjoys blending finance, HR, and operational problem-solving while collaborating closely with others.



Key Responsibilities



1. Finance Support & Reporting

- Using our forecasting methodology, build 1–2 year forecasts and pro forma models for US businesses (including payroll, debt, and operating expenses).

- Support the CEO in preparing agendas and reports for clients’ monthly business reviews.

- Review and interpret monthly financial statements; identify trends, variances, and actionable insights.

- Validate closed books prepared by accountants or bookkeeping teams.

- Use accounting software to pull reports, review transactions, and support analysis (closing is a plus, not required).

- Translate financial data into clear, practical explanations for clients.



2. HR & Payroll Operations

- Manage HR workflows in Gusto or Rippling: policies, employee documents, onboarding & offboarding.

- Run payroll cycles, bonus runs, and exit payroll accurately and on time.

- Manage quarterly and year-end tax reporting.

- Set up benefits and ensure deductions (including retirement plans) sync correctly.

- Monitor the HR support inbox and resolve client requests promptly.

- Maintain secure, organized digital HR files.



3. Compliance & Administrative Support

- Understand rules for US small business designations like sole proprietor, LLC, and S-corporation.

- Handle compliance registrations via CorpNet or state portals.

- Track notices, filings, and deadlines to keep clients compliant.

- Research employment requirements using the company’s paid SHRM account.



4. Client Partnership & Support

- Work closely with business owners to provide clarity on financial and HR processes.

- Respond to client questions promptly, accurately, and with a service-oriented approach.

- Offer insights that help clients run smoother, more compliant operations.

- And any other tasks or responsibilities assigned



Required Technical Skills



- Ability to read and interpret financial statements

- Proficiency with cloud-based accounting software (QBO, Xero, etc.)

- Hands-on experience with Gusto or Rippling

- Familiarity with employer compliance workflows



Strong proficiency with:

- Google Workspace

- Airtable (REQUIRED)

- Excel/Sheets (modeling, formulas, cleanup)

- HR systems & secure file management



Nice to Have:

- Experience assisting with monthly book closings

- Experience building financial forecasts or pro formas

- Multi-state employer compliance knowledge

- SHRM-based research experience



Experience & Background

- Proven extensive experience in finance operations (planning, analysis, reporting), HR operations, payroll, or business operations.

- Experience supporting small businesses or service-based companies

- Strong analytical ability and clear communication skills

- High accuracy in financial, payroll, and compliance work

- Trusted with sensitive data and confidential information



Working Style & Personality

- Curious, detail-driven, and analytical

- Warm, client-focused, and collaborative

- Organized, reliable, and thorough

- Strong follow-through; comfortable with process-heavy tasks

- Calm, professional, and proactive

- High integrity when handling financial and HR data



What this role includes

This is a full-time remote position. The role offers a weekly compensation rate, so you can focus on the work and not manage the clock. Includes provisioned access to our company’s cloud-based systems, a monthly technology stipend for use of your internet and computer, and a health insurance allowance.



Why This Role Matters

We believe in founders who want to make a change through their work. We partner with our small business owners to support the self-funded growth of their companies, without asking them to compromise the integrity of their strongly-held beliefs and principles. We do not apply a “program” to our clients, but work with them to design a business that builds their financial security and aligns with their purpose. We serve as a trusted operating partner across strategy, operations, human resources, finance, and systems, and a trusted personal partner in meeting their own goals. We support their growth as people and leaders.





Kindly complete the form below so we can process your application.






WE WILL NOT ENTERTAIN CANDIDATES WITHOUT THE COMPLETED APPLICATION FORM.

title: Virtual Assistant – Finance & CRM Support (Debt Advisory)
description:
We’re looking for a proactive, detail-oriented Virtual Assistant to join our growing debt advisory and capital markets team. In this role, you’ll play a key part in keeping our clients’ information organized, supporting smooth workflows, managing our CRM (HubSpot), and helping create polished, lender-ready presentations. 



This isn’t a typical admin job—you’ll be working closely with financial documents, spreadsheets, and structured processes, helping us keep everything running efficiently while making a real impact on our clients’ experience. If you enjoy staying organized, taking initiative, and contributing to a fast-paced professional environment, this role is a perfect fit. 



Key Responsibilities

Client Onboarding & Document Management 

• Set up and manage secure client data rooms (Google Drive, Dropbox, SharePoint) 

• Create and maintain standardized folder structures 

• Distribute document request lists and track received vs. missing items 

• Follow up with clients on outstanding documents 

• Maintain version control and confidentiality



Financial Document Organization 

• Collect and organize: financial statements (P&L, Balance Sheet, Cash Flow), bank statements, tax returns, AR/AP aging, and debt schedules 

• Ensure consistent file naming and date formats 

• Flag missing documents or periods (minimal interpretation required)



CRM Administration (HubSpot) 

• Create and update contacts, companies, and deals 

• Maintain clean and consistent CRM records 

• Update deal stages, notes, and activity logs 

• Generate basic pipeline reports



PowerPoint & Presentation Support 

• Prepare draft pitch decks using provided templates 

• Populate slides with provided financial and company data 

• Proofread and format lender-ready materials 

• Create lender-specific versions when needed



Scheduling & Admin Support 

• Coordinate meetings and manage calendars 

• Send invites, agendas, and follow-ups 

• Maintain internal trackers and process checklists 

• Assist with document editing and light research



Qualifications 

• At least 2 years of experience as a Virtual Assistant supporting finance, advisory, lending, real estate, or other professional services businesses preferably with a finance or accounting focus 

• Experience working with CRM systems, preferably HubSpot, or similar platforms 

• Strong professional customer service and written communication skills 

• Highly organized and detail-oriented, with the ability to manage multiple tasks and deadlines 

• Proficient in Microsoft Office (Excel, Word, PowerPoint) and Google Workspace (Sheets, Docs, Drive) 

• Comfortable working with spreadsheets, structured data, and financial documents 

• Strong time management skills with a high level of discretion and confidentiality 

• Self-motivated and able to work independently while following established SOPs 

• Reliable internet connection and a professional home office setup 

• Availability during Mountain Standard Time (MST) business hours 

• Comfortable using a time-tracking system 

• Must have a valid NBI Clearance



How to Apply:

Please send a link to your resume along with a cover letter highlighting your experience with CRM systems (preferably HubSpot) and organizing financial or client information.



We’re excited to find the right fit for our team!

title: Operations Manager & HR Partner (The "Right Hand" to CEO)
description:
I am looking for a high-level Operations Manager / HR Partner in the Philippines to take full ownership of my business results. I am not looking for a Virtual Assistant who waits for instructions. I need a leader who brings solutions, manages the team, and ensures that every hire adds value to the company.



You will be the bridge between my vision and the team's execution. Your goal is to free up my time so I can focus on big-picture growth while you handle the day-to-day operations and team performance.



Your Core Responsibilities:



Team Leadership & HR: Recruit, onboard, and manage a team (including Sourcing and Communications managers). You will track their KPIs and ensure they are productive.



Operations & Supply Chain: Oversee the Alibaba sourcing process. Ensure quality control, negotiate better terms with suppliers, and manage procurement timelines.



Project Management: Drive the development of e-commerce projects, website content updates, and the creation of professional product catalogs.



Strategic Reporting: Provide weekly reports on business performance, team efficiency, and project status.



Required Qualifications:



Proven experience as an Operations Manager, Project Manager, or Team Lead.



Deep understanding of Alibaba sourcing and supply chain management.



Experience in E-commerce (website content management, catalog creation, digital sales flow).



Expert level in project management tools (Asana, ClickUp, or Trello).



Ability to make decisions independently and "manage up" (tell me what needs to be done, don't just ask).



Excellent English communication skills (written and verbal).



Why Work With Us?



Long-term, stable full-time position.



Performance-based bonuses (We reward results, not just hours).



Direct communication with the CEO.



Opportunity to help build and scale a business from the ground up.





HOW TO APPLY (Follow these instructions strictly):



Change the subject line of your application to: "I am the Leader you need for Aromika.

title: Strategic Alibaba Sourcing & Procurement Specialist
description:
We are looking for an experienced Sourcing & Procurement Specialist to handle our supply chain operations on Alibaba. Your main goal is to find the best manufacturers, negotiate the best possible terms, and ensure that every product that leaves China meets our high-quality standards.



You will report directly to our Operations Manager and work closely with the CEO.



Your Core Responsibilities:



Supplier Vetting: Identify and verify manufacturers on Alibaba (avoiding trading companies/middlemen).



Negotiation: Negotiate pricing, MOQs (Minimum Order Quantities), and payment terms (aiming for 30/70 splits via Trade Assurance).



Sample Management: Coordinate sample production and shipping to ensure they meet specifications.



Quality Control: Arrange third-party inspections and ensure all production issues are fixed before final payment.



Logistics Coordination: Work with freight forwarders to ensure timely delivery and correct documentation.



Required Qualifications:



Min 2-3 years of experience specifically in Alibaba sourcing for international markets.



Expertise in Trade Assurance, Incoterms (EXW, FOB, DDP), and factory audits.



Deep understanding of Quality Control (QC) processes.



Strong negotiation skills – you must be comfortable pushing back on suppliers to get better deals.



Highly organized with a "never trust, always verify" mindset.



Why Work With Us?



Stable, long-term full-time role.



Professional growth within a scaling e-commerce business.



Clear management structure (you will have a dedicated Operations Manager to support you).



HOW TO APPLY:



Change the subject line of your application to: "Master Sourcing Agent for Aromika".



List 3 specific "Red Flags" you look for when checking a new supplier's Alibaba profile.



Explain your process for handling a situation where a batch of 500 units has a 10?fect rate during inspection.



Include a link to your Loom video (max 2 minutes) explaining your biggest sourcing "win" (how you saved money or improved quality).

title: Shopify Theme Developer / Designer (Full-Time)
description:
Shopify Theme Developer / Designer (Full-Time)

About Us



We are a fast-growing e-commerce group currently operating 40+ Shopify fashion dropshipping stores across multiple international markets.



Our goal is ambitious: scale to 150 stores in the coming phase.



Our focus is simple — scalable, conversion-driven fashion stores that look clean, premium, and logical.



We are looking for a full-time Shopify Theme Developer / Designer who can take ownership of theme development, redesigns, and store standardization as we grow.



This is not a one-store job.

This is about building, improving, and standardizing themes across dozens — and soon over a hundred — fashion stores.



What You’ll Do



Develop, customize, and improve Shopify themes for fashion dropshipping stores



Work with third-party Shopify themes (ThemeForest, Shopify Theme Store, custom themes, etc.)



Redesign and fully revamp existing Shopify stores (layout, UX, sections, structure)



Ensure designs are logical, consistent, conversion-focused, and scalable



Apply strong design principles (spacing, hierarchy, typography, mobile-first thinking)



Collaborate with our internal team using clear instructions and SOPs



Maintain consistency across many stores while still making each one look premium



What We’re Looking For



Strong experience with Shopify (non-negotiable)



Proven experience as a Shopify theme developer and/or designer



Comfortable working deeply within existing themes



Strong UX/UI understanding for e-commerce, especially fashion



Knows which Shopify themes perform well for fashion dropshipping



Solid knowledge of:



Shopify Liquid



HTML / CSS



Detail-oriented execution across multiple projects



Ability to handle multiple stores at the same time



Nice to Have (But Not Required)



Experience with high-volume dropshipping stores



Understanding of Google Merchant Center / policy-friendly layouts



Experience building reusable theme sections or internal templates



Familiarity with premium fashion branding and clean aesthetics



What You Get



Full-time, long-term position



Work on a growing portfolio of real, revenue-generating stores



High volume of work and a fast learning curve



Opportunity to grow into a Lead Theme Developer / Design role as we scale toward 150 stores



How to Apply



Please include:



A short introduction about yourself



Your Shopify experience



Examples of Shopify stores or themes you’ve worked on



Links to themes you’ve customized or redesigned



If you truly understand Shopify, design logic, and how fashion stores should feel — we want to hear from you.

title: High-Volume DTC Graphic Designer (A-Players Only)
description:
Are you a visual storyteller who understands that a great ad isn't just "pretty"—it’s a conversion machine? We are looking for a relentless, precision-oriented DTC Graphic Designer to join our creative engine.



We don't do "slow." We do high-quality, high-velocity testing. If you thrive in a fast-paced environment where you can churn out winning variations without breaking a sweat (or missing a detail), we want you.



The Mission

You will be responsible for executing 3–5 creative batches per day. We provide the high-level strategy, a preference ad/reference, and the copy via ClickUp. Your job is to take those ingredients and bake 4–5 high-performing variations and hooks for each.



What You’ll Be Doing

Rapid Batch Production: Designing 4–5 variations per concept, focusing on different visual hooks, layouts, and call-to-actions.



Whitelisting Design: Creating authentic, "native-feeling" ads specifically for whitelisted creator content.



AI Integration: Leveraging AI tools (Midjourney, Adobe Firefly, Magnific, etc.) to extend backgrounds, enhance image quality, or generate assets to speed up your workflow.



Tool Mastery: Working seamlessly between Figma (for layout/speed) and Photoshop (for high-end manipulation and grit).



Systematic Execution: Managing your workflow entirely within ClickUp, ensuring every sub-task is checked and every asset is exported correctly.



Who You Are (The "A-Player" Checklist)

DTC Obsessed: You understand the nuances of
, Instagram, and TikTok ads. You know what a "scroll-stopper" actually looks like.



Speed & Precision: You can execute quickly without making sloppy mistakes. Alignment, font consistency, and brand guidelines are second nature to you.



Accountable & Reliable: You don't need a babysitter. You hit your daily batch targets, communicate clearly, and own your deadlines.



Future-Proof: You have experience using AI to optimize your design process and create higher-quality assets in less time.



Requirements

Proven experience designing Static Ads for DTC brands.



Specific experience creating Whitelisting/Creator-style ad layouts.



Proficiency in Figma and Photoshop.



Familiarity with AI design tools to enhance creative output.



Ability to handle a high volume of work (3–5 batches daily).



How to Apply

We are looking for quality over quantity in applications. To be considered, please submit:



A link to your portfolio (specifically highlighting DTC static ads and whitelisting examples).



A brief mention of which AI tools you use in your current workflow.



The word "EXECUTION" at the top of your application so we know you pay attention to detail.

title: Creative Strategist (Paid Ads) – Agent Taylor (Premium Hair Tools)
description:
About Us

Agent Taylor is a fast-growing D2C brand selling premium hair tools across Europe. We scale through high-performing direct response creatives on Meta & TikTok.



Your Role

Own the creative strategy for paid ads: research our target audience, define winning angles/hooks, write clear briefs for creators/editors, and iterate on what converts. This is strategy, not just ideas.



What You’ll Do



Translate customer insights into ad angles, hooks, and scripts



Build weekly creative briefs for UGC & ad variations



Analyze winners/losers and iterate fast



Align creatives with brand aesthetics (premium, trustworthy, native to TikTok/Meta)



Who We’re Looking For



Proven experience creating winning ad strategies for beauty/hair/skincare brands



Deep understanding of our target customer’s pains, desires, and triggers



Performance-minded (hooks, retention, proof, CTA)



Strong communicator with editors/creators



Bonus: you are part of the target audience and can deeply relate to the problem



Important

Fast testing environment. Missed deadlines, vague briefs, or ideas without data = not a fit.



Paid Test (Mandatory)

Short strategy task (angles + hooks for Agent Taylor) before hiring.



Long-Term

If it works: ongoing strategy ownership, weekly output, and growth in scope & pay.

title: Email Marketing Graphic Designer
description:
Email Graphic Designer for InnovaGuest 



Graphic designer that is creative, consistent, fast, flexible, strategic & knows how to drive conversions for premium hospitality brands.



About Us:



We're looking for a 10/10 creative, with an eye for brand, strategic mind & 2-4+ years of experience in
 or graphic design to join the team.



This is a freelance role, ideal for dedicated & professional graphic designers seeking ongoing, long-term collaboration.



You will own graphic design & design strategy for numerous restaurant & hospitality brands, across
 campaigns, automations, pop-ups, loyalty schemes & more.



We're not looking for a designer that drops copy into standard templates. We're looking for a strategic thinker that can spot opportunities to turn ideas, offers & messages into designs before copy is even written. You should be a team collaborator, willing to strategise with the group. You should be fast & flexible, able to turn around 4-6
s per day, with short turnaround times. You should be comfortable using AI as a part of your workflow, for ideation, strategy, design & productivity.



InnovaGuest is a young, growing agency that's already generated £100,000’s for UK-based hospitality clients. We’re looking for a team player that wants to grow with us long-term, building the role & making their mark.



If you have previous experience working with other agencies, we want your skills & expertise, as well as your experience with systems, processes, tools & best practices.



The perfect candidate can help grow InnovaGuest & make the company better. The perfect candidate will also have opportunities to grow into senior roles as we grow.



What the Role Involves Day-to-Day:



 Design:

- Create high-converting, mobile- & desktop-optimised
 designs inside Figma.

- Maintain brand consistency, turning existing brand guidelines into premium templates.

- Appropriate & effective image selection from client image banks.

- Collaborate with our copywriter to bring the words to life visually.

- Turn creative ideas into designs that make guests take action.

- Use AI tools to enhance your designs & productivity.



Uploading to ESP Platforms:

- Slicing
 designs into individual images.

- Building
 designs inside of ESP Platforms (e.g. Klaviyo, Airship, etc.)

- Ensuring mobile- & desktop-optimisation.

- Build text-based sections & full text-based
s inside of ESP Platforms.



Additional Graphic Design Tasks:

- Pop-Up Form Design.

- Loyalty Scheme Graphic Design.

- Splash Page & Landing Page Design.

- Lead Magnet & Downloadables Design.

- Occasional Ad-Hoc Design Tasks.



Strategic Input & Collaboration:

- Attend strategy meetings with clients.

- Develop creative strategies to deliver events, offers, messages, etc.

- Push back on requests that would hurt conversion.

- Collaborate with the team directly (including copywriter & account manager).

- Bring ideas proactively, don't wait to be asked.



What Success Looks Like:



After 90 days, you'll be a high-performing designer/strategist if you are able to achieve these benchmarks:

- Consistent, creative, high-quality designs that our clients love.

- Brand mastery, aligned with the wider branding of our clients.

- Creative strategy & ideas that are translating to successful campaigns.

- Designs that drive high CTRs & high conversion rates.

- Consistently hitting deadlines & managing short turnaround times.

- Consistently delivering 4-6
 designs per day, without sacrificing quality.



What You Need For the Role:

- Must be proficient in English.

- Must be available for 12-24+ hours/week.

- 2-4+ years of graphic design experience 
 design experience preferred).

- Must have experience using Figma, Adobe Illustrator, or similar design tools.

- Deep understanding of brand strategy, consistency & cohesion.

- Understanding of design & UI/UX psychology/strategy.

- DTC brand experience (hospitality experience strongly preferred).



Character Skills Required:

- Fast-mover, able to handle same-day or next-day revisions.

- Creativity that guides strategy, willing to try new ideas.

- Strategic, seeing the bigger picture beyond just the
s.

- Proactive at suggesting improvements, flagging issues, not waiting to be told.

- Collaborative team player, with both tea
mbers & clients.

- Positive, enthusiastic and passionate, bringing everybody up.



Compensation & Benefits:

- $8-12 Hourly rate, that increases over time.

- Fully remote, work from anywhere, with time & timezone flexibility.

- Opportunities to grow into senior & leadership roles.

- $520 yearly Language Learning Stipend (after 3-month trial period).

- Work with leading hospitality brands, including Michelin Star restaurants & multi-location groups/chains.

2: Include ONLY the following in your message:



#1: Your CV.

#2: Your years of experience with short-form content.

#3: Your years of experience with content feedback or coaching.

#4: One sentence on why you're a good fit for this role.

#5: Your portfolio (including examples of your feedback or video/content work).



Note: Messages that do not follow this format will NOT be reviewed.



P.S. Young Publisher is the recruitment company. Successful candidates will work under Social Influence Consulting LLC.

title: Paralegal/Contract Administrator
description:
Paralegal / Contract Administrator

Boutique Entertainment Law Firm | Remote (PST Hours)

The Role

Join a high-energy, fast-paced transactional office at the heart of the entertainment industry. We handle film/TV production legal, finance, IP, publishing and talent representation. This isn't a 9-to-5 "paper-filing" job; we need a "Closer"—someone who thrives on the adrenaline of high-volume deal flow and moves agreements from first draft to execution with zero errors.

Key Responsibilities

Deal Flow Management: Track intake and manage the entire contract lifecycle; ensure no deadlines or "windows" are missed.

Drafting & Redlining: Prepare first-pass production documents, quality-check redlines, and manage corporate governance filings. Legal summaries, memo and audits.

Signature Administration: Own the DocuSign process; relentlessly follow up with clients, agents, and opposing counsel to break administrative logjams.

IP & Closings: Coordinate copyright/IP documentation and compile comprehensive "Closing Bibles."

Office Liaison: Manage appointment coordination,
 tracking, and database audits and updates to keep the practice organized.

Qualifications

Certification: Proven paralegal training and valid certificate holder.

Experience: Direct experience in contract deal flow, redlining, and IP administration is required.

Tech Stack: Expert proficiency in MS Word (Advanced Redlines), Adobe, Google Calendar, Dropbox, and DocuSign.

Attributes: Highly dependable and punctual; must be able to take initiative and work independently under strict timelines.

The Ideal Candidate

High EQ:Able to navigate high-stakes, high-pressure negotiations with a "thick skin."

Hyyper-Organized: Can prioritize a messy deal sheet and identify immediate "must-signs."

Results-Oriented: You don't just track tasks; you ensure the deal gets done.

How to Apply

Please submit a CV and  a non-AI generated cover letter detailing:

1. Why you are the right fit for a fast-paced entertainment office.

2. The specific training that sets you apart.

3. Your proposed work schedule (based on PST) and 

4. your long-term professional goals.

"To prove you read this, use exactly 5 Apply Points when you submit your application."
salary: $850 per month  to start plus bonuses

title: Senior Bookkeeper *Superstar Only*
description:
We are looking for two experienced bookkeepers to join our finance team and take ownership of expense categorization, transaction reconciliation, accounts payable, and invoice processing across multiple legal entities.



The bookkeepers will work closely with the CFO, ensuring that all financial transactions are accurately recorded, categorized, and reconciled on a regular basis. This role is ideal for someone who is detail-oriented, organized, and comfortable managing financial data across multiple platforms — including Xero, Stripe, PayPal, Shopify, and our custom CRM.



Key Responsibilities

- Categorize all expenses and transactions in Xero, ensuring accurate classification for reporting and compliance

- Reconcile transactions across multiple payment platforms, including Stripe, PayPal, Shopify, and custom CRM tools

- Manage accounts payable, ensuring all invoices are properly reviewed, recorded, and scheduled for payment

- Assist with invoice processing, ensuring all vendor invoices are accurately documented and match purchase orders where applicable

- Work closely with the CFO to provide up-to-date financial records for monthly, quarterly, and annual reporting

- Ensure all financial data is accurate and properly organized to support compliance across multiple jurisdictions

- Flag discrepancies or unusual transactions for review by the CFO



What We’re Looking For

- At least 5 years of experience in bookkeeping and expense reconciliation

- Strong proficiency in Xero

- Experience working with Stripe, PayPal, Shopify, and custom CRMs

- Strong attention to detail and organizational skills

- Experience handling multi-entity, multi-currency financial data preferred

- Comfortable working in a remote-first environment

- Fluent in English, both written and spoken



Requirements for Effective Remote Work

- Reliable computer or laptop capable of photo and video editing

- Stable high-speed internet connection

- Conducive work environment



Working Schedule

- Full-time opportunity

- Remote work setup (Philippines-based applicants only)



Benefits

- Competitive pay

- Training and growth opportunities

- Opportunity to work with a fast-growing content-driven company



Salary range

- Php 40, 000 - Php 65,000 (based on experience)



Application Instructions

Since this is a long-term position, there will be an in-depth qualification process. If you believe you have what it takes, here is what to do next:



Please go to the link below, review the questions carefully, and share the required information.






If you believe you meet our qualifications and requirements, we encourage you to apply now and become a valuable part of our rapidly expanding company.

title: Google Ads Specialist (Shopify + GA4) — WFO
description:
(a) About the role



We run two established pet businesses (e-commerce + veterinary clinic) with a deep base of warm customers. We are hiring a Google specialist to own our Google Ads + measurement stack end-to-end.



We are already spending on Google. Your first mission is to audit and fix our setup quickly, so we stop waste and can trust our tracking.



(b) What you will own



Google Ads (across all inventories)

- Manage and optimize campaigns across Search / Shopping / Performance Max / Display / YouTube

- Set clear campaign goals (sales/conversions) and control budget allocation

- Build and maintain clean account structure, audiences, and exclusions

- Improve efficiency and incrementality (not vanity reach)



Measurement (critical)

- Set up or fix GA4 for Shopify (and GTM if needed)

- Ensure conversion tracking is correct (no duplicates/wrong conversions)

- Enforce UTM discipline + build a simple weekly dashboard

- Document the setup so it stays clean long-term

- Audit our current campaigns and recommend what to pause/keep (fast)

- Improve account structure and spend efficiency

- Manage remarketing and any existing campaign types we are running (we will align on scope)



GA4 / Tracking / Measurement (critical)

- Set up or fix GA4 for Shopify (and GTM if needed)

- Ensure conversion tracking is correct and validated (no duplicate / wrong conversions)

- Enforce UTM discipline and build a simple weekly performance dashboard

- Document the setup so it stays clean over time



Our operating principles 

- We prioritize measurable ROI and scale only when tracking is clean

- We do not want uncontrolled broad spend

- Any expansion into new inventories is based on a clear test plan and results



(c) Requirements

- Strong Google Ads experience across multiple inventories (not just one)

- Proven GA4 setup experience for Shopify (from scratch or fixing broken setups)



Clear communicator, organized, fast execution



Bonus: Merchant Center + product feed optimization experience



(d) Please apply but submitting your CV and relevant work experience.

title: Digital Designer (PT-remote)
description:
Industry: E-commerce (Pet supplements) 

Work type: Part-time 

Schedule: 20 hours per week

 

Job Summary:

We are seeking a talented Digital Designer with experience in e-commerce and social media content creation. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in graphic design, digital media, and e-commerce platforms, with the ability to design visually compelling content that drives customer engagement and supports our marketing and sales goals.



Key Responsibilities:

>Content Creation: Design engaging visual content for social media channels (Meta, TT),
 marketing, paid ads, and e-commerce websites.

>E-commerce Assets: Develop and optimize product images, banners, and other assets for our e-commerce site, ensuring they meet brand guidelines and enhance the online shopping experience.



>Social Media Campaigns: Create compelling social media graphics, infographics, and promotional assets that align with the brand's voice and aesthetic.



>Brand Consistency: Ensure all digital assets align with our brand identity, maintaining consistency across all platforms.

>Collaboration: Work closely with the marketing, product, and e-commerce teams to understand design requirements and deliver high-quality visuals that meet business objectives.

>Optimization: Regularly update and refresh design assets based on performance data and evolving trends to maximize engagement and sales.



>Trend Awareness: Stay current with industry trends, design techniques, and emerging tools to bring fresh ideas and innovative designs to our digital marketing efforts.

>Adaptability: Work on multiple projects simultaneously, managing time effectively to meet deadlines.



Qualifications:

Proven experience as a Digital Designer, Graphic Designer, or similar role, preferably within the e-commerce and consumer goods industries.

Proficiency in design software (Adobe Creative Suite - Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign, etc.) and web design tools (e.g., Sketch, Figma, or similar).

Strong understanding of e-commerce platforms (Amazon, Shopify) and their design requirements.

Experience designing for social media, including Instagram,
, TT and other popular platforms.

Familiarity with web analytics tools (e.g., Google Analytics) to assess performance and optimize designs.

Excellent attention to detail and strong typography skills.

Creative mindset with the ability to conceptualize and execute new ideas.

Ability to work independently and as part of a team in a fast-paced environment.

A strong portfolio showcasing previous digital design work (e-commerce, social media, and advertising).



To apply share resume/cv and design portfolio with answer to screening questions below::



1. Can you describe your step-by-step process of how you create A-plus content and infographics for Amazon?



2. Which design tools do you use the most or the most frequently?



3. Was there a time where you worked on a campaign where the design changes that you did improve the performance in terms of the product conversion or click rate? 



4. What was the most challenging one where you had a lot of back and forth, they had a lot of revisions or inputs?



5. How do you typically approach a new product design project from concept to execution?



6. What's your process for competitor analysis and how do you incorporate those findings into your design?

title: Executive Virtual Assistant with Agency Experience
description:
Job Title: Executive/Virtual Assistant (Agency Experience Required)



Location: Remote



Job Type: Full-Time / Part-Time



About Us: 

We are a fast-growing digital marketing agency specializing in client acquisition for MedSpas. We help businesses scale through high-converting ad campaigns and appointment booking with our in-house call center. As we continue to grow, we’re looking for a skilled Executive/Virtual Assistant with agency experience to support operations, client onboarding, and campaign management.



Key Responsibilities:



Client Onboarding & Account Setup

- Assist in launching new clients by setting up campaigns, CRM systems, and tracking tools.

- Configure GoHighLevel (GHL) accounts, including pipelines, automations, and reporting dashboards.

- Ensure smooth onboarding by collecting assets, permissions, and key details from clients.



Operations & Automations:

- Manage and optimize automation workflows within GHL and Make.com.

- Set up lead nurturing sequences, follow-up automations, and CRM integrations.

- Monitor and troubleshoot any automation issues.



Media Buying & Campaign Management:

- Assist in setting up and managing basic Meta 
 & Instagram) ad campaigns.

- Assist to optimize ad performance by adjusting budgets, targeting, and creatives.

- Generate campaign performance reports.



Reporting & Analytics:

- Generate weekly and monthly reports on campaign performance, lead quality, and conversion rates.

- Track key metrics and assist to identify areas for improvement in client campaigns.

- Prepare reports for internal teams and clients.



Administrative & Executive Support:

- Manage schedules, meetings, and follow-ups.

- Organize internal documentation and SOPs.

- Handle
 correspondence with clients and team members.



Requirements:

- Proven experience as an EA/VA in an SMMA or digital marketing agency.

- Strong understanding of GoHighLevel (GHL), Meta Ads Manager, and automation tools.

- Experience setting up and managing client onboarding workflows.

- Familiarity with automation platforms like Make.com, Zapier, or Integromat.

- Strong project management skills and ability to meet deadlines.

- Excellent written and verbal communication skills.

- Tech-savvy with experience using Google Workspace, Slack, and task management tools (ClickUp, Trello, etc.).



Preferred Qualifications:

- Experience with lead nurturing automations.

- Basic knowledge of landing pages and funnel optimization.

- Prior experience in MedSpa, healthcare, or local lead generation industries is a plus.



Perks & Benefits:

- Competitive pay based on experience.

- Fully remote role with flexible working hours.

- Opportunity to work closely with a high-performing team.

- Growth potential within the company.



How to Apply:

If you’re excited to be part of a fast-growing agency and have the skills we’re looking for, apply now! Send your resume, portfolio (if applicable), and a short message on why you’re a great fit for this role.



We look forward to working with you!



Medspa Patients

title: Property Leasing Manager (LTR & PadSplit)
description:
Are you great at selling tenants on rentals, screening them fast, and closing deals all the way through lease signing and move-in?



Can you start adding value on day one, taking ownership of listings, leads, and conversions?



We’re a fast-growing property management group managing LTRs and PadSplit homes. We’re looking for someone smart, diligent, and proactive — someone who thrives on results, not supervision.



If you know how to:

- Market and lease properties quickly

- Prequalify and screen tenants effectively

- Coordinate move-ins and manage lead funnels

…then you’ll fit right in.





Long term, you’ll have the chance to build and lead your own leasing team as we scale.





Requirements:

- Strong leasing or property management experience (LTR or co-living preferred)

- Excellent spoken and written English (C2 level)

- High attention to detail, strong follow-through, and responsive communication

- Available to work U.S. EST/ET hours





If this sounds like you, we’d love to hear from you. Apply now and start making an impact immediately.





DO NOT APPLY IF:



Your English is not near-native or highly fluent (C2 level).

You do not have a strong leasing background.

You do not have a background in sales.

You are not tech-savvy.

You are not detail-oriented and highly diligent.

You need constant supervision or struggle to take ownership.





Application Process:

- Submit your resume and a short video introduction (via Google Drive or Loom — make sure the link is accessible). In your video, briefly introduce yourself and share why you’d be great for this role.

- Send us a message on OnlineJobs.ph explaining why you’re the right fit and what makes you stand out.

- Wait for our response — we carefully review every application and will contact shortlisted candidates for the next steps.



Thank you!

description:

Are you a top seller, always hitting targets but feeling capped, doing all the hard work yet your income doesn’t match your effort?



This is your chance to change that. Work hard now, earn more than you ever have, and build the freedom, security, and lifestyle you’ve always wanted. The hours are long — 9-hour EST shifts with a 12-hour availability window, 6 days a week — but the rewards are massive: $600 USD base or commissions, whichever is higher, and uncapped earnings. High performers make $10,000 per month by only making 200 calls per day.

Convert inquiries and trial users into paying customers and subscriptions

Guide buyers through product and subscription options

Maintain accurate performance records

600 USD Base pay so you can ease into commissions

High-Caliber Leads: Warm, pre-qualified prospects only – no cold calling

What You’ll Do



Follow up with warm leads and past visitors

Convert trial users into paying customers and subscriptions

Maintain accurate performance records



Why This Role Stands Out

600 Base pay - This is just for easing top closers into commission structure.

Loves closing high-value deals

title: Media Buyer for 8-figure brand
description:
Media Buyer Purpose



The purpose of the Media Buyer role at BECH & YD ECOM is first & foremost to be rock-solid in managing the day-to-day of ad accounts & making data-based decisions that drive revenue for our Shopify brands.



As a media buyer, you take pride in doing all the little things correctly & have evidence to prove your reliability & trustworthiness. Managing tens of thousands of dollars per month of someone else’s capital means it is your duty to pay immense attention to detail with every action you take.



You are also on the front lines of all things data for clients. This means you as the Media Buyer need to be accountable & take the initiative in analyzing, interpreting, and reporting that data with the team in order for all of us to make more informed & better decisions, faster.



Your active purpose at BECH & YD ECOM is to work alongside our Strategist & Creative Team to manage & move quickly in ad accounts to get ads live, follow our media buying systems & frameworks to make smart decisions, and analyze & report data to ensure we are hitting our goals month over month.



Media Buyer Primary Roles 



Onboarding:

Performing quality checks on Meta Business Managers

Doing research to find the top-performing ads

Learning and embracing the BECH & YD ECO
dia buying structure



Ongoing:

Create & set dynamic creative tests weekly following the guidance of the creative team

Understand KPIs to scale budgets up & down following the BECH & YD ECOM Scaling Process

Attend weekly team calls to communicate directly with the creative team & strategist on ad account performance

Complete weekly & monthly data reports

Leverage attribution tools & senior strategists for smart decision-making 

Communicate with the team daily on performance

Share any ad concepts or ideas based on data interpretation

Download and upload organic content from social platforms



Qualifications & Character Traits 



Direct Experience Qualifications

Setting up & launching Meta ads for Shopify business

Managing ad accounts spending above $1000 per day

Setting up & troubleshooting tracking for Meta Ads

Analyzing data & providing reports to a team

Working in a team environment & understanding individual roles



CHARACTER TRAITS

Excruciating level of attention to detail with all responsibilities

Moves quickly & is easily accessible 

Extremely well organized, punctual & able to keep order amidst chaos.

Time-efficient with tasks but willing to spend extra time to make things right

Ability to interpret & communicate data effectively with a team

Accountable & reliable person inside of the ad account & outside

Communicates effectively with the team & shares ideas

Coachable & desire to grow their skill set & personal traits





This is NOT For You If: 

You do not pay close attention to detail

You don’t have experience running Meta ads

You are a slow mover

You are not a good communicator 

You don’t like a high-operating environment

You are unorganized

You are not a team player 

You don’t understand eCommerce

You are not passionate about growth 



Compensation



• Starting salary: $5 per hour + Performance-Based Bonuses

• Work week: 6 days a week



Growth Potential 



At BECH & YD ECOM, we highly value growth and development in all areas. With great performance, the potential for you as a Media Buyer is significant.



Important Application Requirement



To qualify for this role, you must submit a Loom video (2–3 minutes) as part of your application. Please briefly introduce yourself, explain why you’re a strong fit for the Media Buyer position, and share one specific example of how you’ve successfully managed and scaled Meta ad accounts.



Applications submitted without a Loom video will not be considered.

title: VSL Video Editor - DTC Wellness Brand [Full-time]
description:
We're a DTC brand growing fast on TikTok Shop, Amazon, and Shopify. 



We’re looking for a skilled video editor to join our tea,. You’ll create engaging VSLs for paid social advertising on Meta and TikTok. These are 2 - 6 minute vertical videos combining UGC clips, b-roll, text overlays, captions, voiceover, and music - designed to stop the scroll and drive purchases.



What You’ll Do:

Edit VSLs

Create 4 different hook variations per VSLs

Follow provided scripts and reference videos (we’ll give you examples to model)

Add captions, text overlays, transitions, and motion graphics (composite overlays, split-screen layouts, animated icons, glow effects)

Generate AI b-roll using Higgsfield AI or similar tools (product scenes, cinematic visuals, medical visualizations) and composite them into the edit

Sync voiceover with visuals and add background music



Must-Haves:

2+ years of video editing experience (VSL or direct-response ads preferred)

Proficient in Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, or any of your choice

Strong sense of pacing, storytelling, and visual engagement

Reliable internet (100Mbps+) and own editing equipment

Available for 40 hours/week

Responsive communication (reply within 4 hours during working hours)

Experience with AI video generation tools (Higgsfield AI, Kling, Sora) for creating b-roll and product scenes from prompts



Nice-to-Haves:

Experience editing for health/wellness or e-commerce brands

After Effects skills for motion graphics

Understanding of Meta Ads / TikTok creative best practices



To Apply

Please include:

(1) Your portfolio or reel with at least 2 VSL/ad examples

(2) What editing software you use and your typical turnaround time

title: CRO specialist
description:
## Job Opening: CRO Specialist – Shopify (Continuous Optimization)



**Location:** Remote / Hybrid

**Hours:** 32–40 per week

**Contract:** Full-time / Freelance (open to discussion)



### About the Role



We are looking for a **Conversion Rate Optimization (CRO) Specialist** who takes full ownership of the **continuous optimization of our Shopify store**. You will analyze data, identify conversion bottlenecks, and run structured A/B tests while directly implementing improvements in the Shopify codebase.



This is a **hands-on, execution-driven role**. You are expected to test, build, measure, and iterate—making decisions based on data, not opinions.



---



## Responsibilities



* Own and execute a **continuous CRO roadmap**

* Design, launch, and analyze **A/B tests**

* Identify and fix conversion leaks across the funnel:



  * Product pages (PDP)

  * Cart

  * Checkout

* Optimize:



  * UX and user flows

  * Product page structure, copy, and trust elements

  * Checkout and payment experience

* Work with data from:



  * Shopify Analytics

---

---

title: HubSpot Specialist
description:
•APPLICANTS WHO APPLY THROUGH THE LINK BELOW WILL BE SCREENED•



About us:

gigCMO Ltd. is a HubSpot Gold Partner. We are dynamic growth consultancy providing strategic marketing leadership and expertise to start-ups, scale-ups, and SMEs, propelling them toward profitable revenue growth. Nestled in the heart of the City of London, United Kingdom, we specialise in supporting B2B clients in expanding their reach domestically and internationally. Our dedicated team, operating under the banner of Magnacca International, is strategically based in the Philippines. We chose this location for its pool of talent, strong social skills, enthusiasm, and unwavering loyalty.



Position Overview:

We are currently seeking an adept and proactive HubSpot Specialist to join our team. This role is pivotal in driving automation, streamlining workflows, optimising pipeline strategies, and refining reporting mechanisms within our HubSpot environment.





Key Skills and Responsibilities:



Automation Excellence:

•Lead the development and implementation of advanced automation solutions within HubSpot to streamline processes, increase efficiency, and reduce manual tasks.

•Utilise HubSpot's automation tools, such as workflows, sequences, and bots, to orchestrate seamless customer journeys, automate repetitive tasks, and improve lead management processes.

•Collaborate closely with tea
mbers to identify opportunities for automation across various departments and implement solutions to drive productivity gains.

•Continuously monitor and optimise automation performance, leveraging data insights to refine workflows and ensure maximum effectiveness.



Workflow Enhancement:

•Evaluate existing workflows in HubSpot and identify opportunities for optimisation and automation to improve operational efficiency and streamline business processes.

•Design and implement custom workflows to support cross-functional collaboration, automate repetitive tasks, enforce standard operating procedures, and ensure data integrity.

•Provide training and support to tea
mbers on HubSpot workflows, best practices, and system capabilities to drive user adoption, enhance productivity, and optimise the platform's use.

•Collaborate with colleagues to develop and implement workflow governance policies, standardisation guidelines, and continuous improvement initiatives to drive ongoing efficiency gains and process optimisation.



Pipeline Development Expertise:

•Lead the design, implementation, and optimisation of sales pipelines within HubSpot, ensuring alignment with business objectives and sales processes.

•Collaborate with sales and marketing teams to define lead scoring criteria, develop lead nurturing strategies, automate lead qualification processes, and accelerate sales cycle progression.

•Continuously monitor pipeline performance, identify bottlenecks, and propose solutions to improve pipeline velocity, conversion rates, and overall revenue generation.

•Develop and maintain comprehensive documentation for sales pipelines, including standardised processes, workflows, and best practices to support scalability and consistency across the organisation.



Reporting Mastery:

•Generate a wide range of reports and dashboards in HubSpot to monitor key performance indicators, track campaign performance, evaluate customer engagement, and provide actionable insights for decision-making.

•Conduct thorough data analysis to identify trends, opportunities, and areas for improvement and present findings clearly and concisely.

•Work closely with colleagues to understand reporting requirements, develop custom reporting solutions, and continuously refine reporting processes to meet evolving business needs.

•Collaborate with tea
mbers to develop automated reporting processes and scheduled reports to streamline data delivery and improve decision-making efficiency.



Qualifications:

•Proven experience in HubSpot administration and implementation, focusing on automation, streamlining workflows, optimising pipeline strategies, and refining reporting.

•HubSpot Certificate (REQUIRED)

•Minimum 2 years of experience

•Familiarity with specific HubSpot modules such as Marketing Hub, Sales Hub, Service Hub, Content Hub, Operations Hub, and Commerce Hub.

•Please specify the HubSpot modules you have worked with and the level-pro or enterprise

•Strong analytical skills and the ability to translate data into actionable insights.

•Excellent communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to work effectively across teams and departments.

•Detail-oriented with a proactive mindset and a passion for continuous improvement.



Application Requirements: This role demands a full-time commitment and is not compatible with another full-time job.

To be considered, kindly fill out the form using this link: 

****Only successful candidates will be contacted for interviews.*****

***Incomplete requirements will not be considered***

***Please do not apply if you do not meet the above requirements***



Compensation: Php 35,000 (depending on whether the applicant meets 100% of the requirements)

title: Content Manager
description:
About Us



Lightup Tutoring makes GCSE English feel achievable, confidence-boosting, and genuinely engaging. Through our online platform, The Lightup Hub, we support students with high-quality videos, structured notes, quizzes, and personalised revision plans that actually work.

We’ve already supported over 150,000 students and we’re growing fast. Everything we publish matters because it directly impacts how students learn and how confident they feel walking into exams.

Behind every great lesson is excellent execution. That’s where you come in.



Our Mission



We believe education should feel empowering, not overwhelming. Too many students struggle because content is poorly organised, rushed, or unclear. We’re building a platform where quality, clarity, and consistency come first, so students always know they’re learning from something they can trust.



The Role 



This role owns content delivery end-to-end. You’ll be responsible for making sure every piece of content goes from idea to live on the platform smoothly, on time, and to a very high standard.

You’ll sit at the centre of multiple moving parts. Working closely with the CEO, product, editors, and external contributors, you’ll organise timelines, manage deadlines, format resources, upload content into the Lightup backend, and quality-check everything before it goes live.

If you love organisation, precision, and making complex workflows run like clockwork, this role is for you.



What You’ll Do



Content Operations & Delivery:

1. Own the full lifecycle of content from planning through to publication

2. Manage timelines and deadlines across videos, quizzes, PDFs, and revision resources

3. Coordinate filming schedules and content creation with the CEO and contributors

4. Liaise with external creators when needed to ensure content is delivered on time



Content Formatting & Uploading:

1. Format learning resources including PowerPoints and PDFs to match Lightup standards

2. Upload videos, quizzes, and written content into the Lightup backend

3. Ensure all content follows the correct structure and naming conventions



Quality Assurance

1. Proofread all content for spelling, grammar, clarity, and accuracy

2. Check that GCSE English terminology and explanations are precise and correct

3. QA content post-upload to ensure everything works properly and displays correctly

4. Spot errors before students ever see them



Organisation & Ownership

1. Create and maintain clear content trackers and delivery schedules

2. Proactively identify risks, bottlenecks, or missing pieces and resolve them early

3. Orchestrate multiple contributors while keeping standards high

4. Take full ownership of content delivery without needing close supervision



Who We’re Looking For



Must have:

1. Experience in content management, or production management

2. Strong experience coordinating and leading projects with multiple stakeholders

3. Exceptional written English and proofreading ability



Nice to have:

1. Experience in education or edtech

2. Experience working with learning platforms or CMS systems

3. Previous operation business administration 



Who You Are:

1. Highly organised and process-driven

2. Extremely detail-oriented with a low tolerance for errors

3. Confident managing deadlines and holding others accountable

4. Comfortable working autonomously with high responsibility

5. Calm, reliable, and precise under pressure

6. Passionate about producing high-quality educational content



Why This Role Matters:

This role is critical to Lightup’s success. You’re not just “uploading content”. You’re protecting quality, consistency, and trust. Students rely on what we publish, and you’ll be the person ensuring everything meets the standard they deserve.

If you love making systems work, enjoy ownership, and take pride in flawless execution, you’ll thrive here.



Application: If you are interested in this role, please reach out and we will send you an internal application link for you to complete for consideration by our panel.

title: Amazon Compliance Specialist
description:
Regulatory & Legal Compliance



Conduct in-depth research on FDA, EPA, FTC, and other relevant federal and state regulations.

Ensure compliance with international product safety standards (EU, UK, Canada, Asia-Pacific) when applicable.

Perform ongoing monitoring of regulatory updates and interpret implications for product categories.

Support intellectual property due diligence to prevent patent, copyright, or trademark infringement.



Risk Management & Product Compliance



Evaluate new and existing products for compliance risks and advise stakeholders on mitigation strategies.

Develop compliance testing protocols and coordinate with third-party labs and certification agencies.

Manage corrective actions, recalls, or withdrawals in alignment with Amazon’s policies and legal requirements.

Conduct audits of product listings and seller submissions to prevent unlawful or restricted product selection.



Cross-Functional Collaboration



Partner with Product Development, Supply Chain, and Seller Performance teams to execute compliance initiatives.

Provide clear guidance to vendors, suppliers, and internal teams on compliance requirements.

Train cross-functional stakeholders on compliance best practices and emerging regulatory risks.

Act as a subject matter expert to business teams during product launches, regulatory reviews, and inspections.



Policy & Process Development



Draft and implement compliance procedures, standard operating protocols (SOPs), and escalation processes.

Support automation and system-based compliance controls to scale monitoring and enforcement.

Contribute to internal policy development regarding restricted products, product claims, and safety certifications.

Continuously improve workflows to enhance accuracy, timeliness, and audit readiness.



Documentation & Reporting



Maintain accurate records of compliance assessments, approvals, and regulatory correspondence.

Prepare detailed reports and risk assessments for leadership review.

Provide supervisors with regular feedback on task progress, emerging risks, and resolution status.

Ensure confidentiality of sensitive data, supplier information, and Amazon business strategy.





Experience interacting directly with regulators including federal and state agencies

Experience in research and analyzing federal and state regulations

Familiarity and experience in dealing with FDA regulation is REQUIRED

Familiarity with international compliance frameworks (REACH, RoHS, CE marking).

Experience in compliance auditing, regulatory affairs, or legal review.

Strong analytical and problem-solving skills with attention to detail.

Excellent communication skills for engaging with global teams and regulators.

Ability to handle multiple projects in a fast-paced environment with strict deadline

title: Client Nurturing Specialist
description:
About Proactive Marketing



The Proactive Marketing mission: “To help Chiropractors build their dream practice while having a positive impact on the health of their patients.”



We not only guarantee the best results for our clients, but we also prioritize building a one-of-a-kind working experience for our team. We are 100% remote, and we encourage our employees to work from anywhere in the world.



We have a strong company culture that focuses on innovation, personal development, leadership, and cultivating a winning environment. We believe that our company is most productive when our employees are fulfilled, challenged, and working to achieve both their personal and professional goals, while constantly striving for their own personal next level.



Our #1 Core Value: Better Than Yesterday



In today’s world taking initiative is a critical component of success. Therefore, we encourage tea
mbers to take initiative in the direction that they see fit so that they can learn valuable lessons along the way and contribute to relevant team goals. We don’t micromanage and we encourage an environment of responsibility and leadership.



About the Role



We are looking for a Client Nurturing Specialist to help manage and protect our client experience behind the scenes.



This role is not sales and not account management — your primary mission is to ensure clients feel supported, tracked, and never forgotten, while reducing administrative workload for our Account Managers so they can focus on high-value conversations and faster response times.



If you are highly organized, process-driven, and naturally attentive to client satisfaction, this role is for you.



Primary Objective



To reduce administrative workload for Account Managers by owning client tracking, follow-ups, and quality control — ultimately improving retention, continuity, and overall client experience.



Key Responsibilities



  -Client Onboarding & Launch Oversight

  -Ensure all clients are fully onboarded within the ideal timeline

  -Confirm that every onboarding and launch call strictly follows SOP

  -Flag missing steps, delays, or process gaps immediately

  -Call Quality Control & Client Sentiment Monitoring

  -Quality check every onboarding and launch call

  -Identify signs of frustration, dissatisfaction, or confusion

  -Proactively alert Account Managers if a client appears unhappy or disengaged

  -Client Retention & Lifecycle Tracking

  -Maintain a clear, up-to-date spreadsheet of:

        -Clients nearing the end of their service term (for retention follow-up)

        -Clients who stopped service (for re-engagement after 1–2 months)

        -Ensure no client reaches an end date without a retention action planned

        -Re-Engagement & Responsiveness Tracking

        -Track clients who become unresponsive

        -Coordinate outreach through different channels 
, Slack, CRM, etc.)

        -Help bring conversations back in sync before issues escalate

        -Internal Coordination

        -Keep Account Managers informed with clear notes, flags, and updates

        -Maintain clean, accurate documentation at all times



What We’re Looking For



 -Extremely detail-oriented and organized

 -Strong follow-up and tracking skills

 -Comfortable reviewing call recordings and SOPs

 -Able to spot emotional cues and early client dissatisfaction

 -Process-driven with a strong sense of ownership

 -Clear written communication skills

 -Experience in client success, operations, VA support, or account coordination is a plus



Why This Role Matters:



 -Your work directly impacts

 -Client satisfaction

 -Client retention

 -Faster response times

 -Better focus for Account Managers

 -A smoother, more professional client experience

 -You are the system behind the relationship.



Role Details



Remote



Full-time / Part-time (adjust as needed)



Long-term opportunity for the right candidate

title: Finance Business Partner
